6018008Di2015UniqueSeparatorWaitHandle.WaitAll
6018008Di2015UniqueSeparator// we need to keep a list of synchronization eventsDi2015NewLinevar finishEvents = new List<EventWaitHandle>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < records.Count; i++ )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // for each job, create an event and add it to the listDi2015NewLine    var signal = new EventWaitHandle(false, EventResetMode.ManualReset);Di2015NewLine    finishEvents.Add(signal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we need to catch the id in a separate variableDi2015NewLine    // for the closure to work as expectedDi2015NewLine    var id = records[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var thread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do the jobDi2015NewLine            ThreadJob(id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // signal the main threadDi2015NewLine            signal.Set();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWaitHandle.WaitAll(finishEvents.ToArray());Di2015NewLine
6018008Di2015UniqueSeparatorThreadPool
6018008Di2015UniqueSeparatornew Thread

6018008Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (var evt in finishEvents)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    evt.Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6018008Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Semaphore _sem = new Semaphore(3, 3);    // Capacity of 3Di2015NewLinestatic List<string> _records = new List<string>(new string[] { "aaa", "bbb", "ccc", "ddd", "eee", "fff", "ggg", "hhh" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var finishEvents = new List<EventWaitHandle>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < _records.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var signal = new EventWaitHandle(false, EventResetMode.ManualReset);Di2015NewLine        finishEvents.Add(signal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var id = _records[i];Di2015NewLine        var t = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThreadJob(id);Di2015NewLine            signal.Set();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        t.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WaitHandle.WaitAll(finishEvents.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(_records.Count);Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void ThreadJob(object id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(id + " wants to enter");Di2015NewLine    _sem.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(id + " is in!");Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(id + " is leaving");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lock (_records)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _records.Remove((string)id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _sem.Release();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6020708Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Regex scriptTagRegex = new Regex(Di2015NewLine    "script", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///     Processes the provided string, creating a quoted JavaScript string literal.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="str">The string to process</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A string containing a quoted JavaScript string literal</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string JavaScriptStringLiteral(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine    foreach (char c in str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (c)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case '\\"':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\\\"");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\\\\\");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\b':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\b");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\f':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\f");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\n':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\n");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\r':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\r");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\t':Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\\\t");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                int i = (int)c;Di2015NewLine                if (i < 32 || i > 127)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.AppendFormat("\\\\u{0:X04}", i);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If a Javascript tag contains "</script>", then it terminates aDi2015NewLine    // script block.  Start by replacing each 's'/'S' with an escapeDi2015NewLine    // sequence so it doesn't trigger this.Di2015NewLine    return scriptTagRegex.Replace(Di2015NewLine        sb.ToString(),Di2015NewLine        m => (m.Value[0] == 's' ? "\\\\u0073" : "\\\\u0053") + m.Value.Substring(1));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6022581Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar s = "['a;b;c','d','e']";Di2015NewLineList<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineint i = 0;Di2015NewLinewhile (i < s.Length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char c = s[i++];Di2015NewLine    if (c == '[')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (i < s.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            c = s[i++];Di2015NewLine            if (c == '\\'')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int start = i;Di2015NewLine                while (i < s.Length && s[i] != '\\'')Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                list.Add(s.Substring(start, i - start));Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (i < s.Length && s[i] == ',')Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            if (i < s.Length && s[i] == ']')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineforeach (var item in list)Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine

i < Recycler.Items().Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine        FolderItem FI = Recycler.Items().Item(i);Di2015NewLine        string FileName = Recycler.GetDetailsOf(FI, 0);Di2015NewLine        if (Path.GetExtension(FileName) == "") FileName += Path.GetExtension(FI.Path);Di2015NewLine        //Necessary for systems with hidden file extensions.Di2015NewLine        string FilePath = Recycler.GetDetailsOf(FI, 1);Di2015NewLine        if (Item == Path.Combine(FilePath, FileName)) {Di2015NewLine          DoVerb(FI, "ESTORE");Di2015NewLine          return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private bool DoVerb(FolderItem Item, string Verb) {Di2015NewLine      foreach (FolderItemVerb FIVerb in Item.Verbs()) {Di2015NewLine        if (FIVerb.Name.ToUpper().Contains(Verb.ToUpper())) {Di2015NewLine          FIVerb.DoIt();Di2015NewLine          return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6025570Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EvaluatorsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string Wrap( Match m, string original, string format )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // doesn't match the entire string, otherwise it is a matchDi2015NewLine        if (m.Length != original.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // has a preceding letter or digit (i.e., not a real match).Di2015NewLine            if (m.Index != 0 && char.IsLetterOrDigit( original[m.Index - 1] ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return m.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // has a trailing letter or digit (i.e., not a real match).Di2015NewLine            if (m.Index + m.Length != original.Length && char.IsLetterOrDigit( original[m.Index + m.Length] ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return m.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // it is a match, apply the formatDi2015NewLine        return string.Format( format, m.Value );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
6025570Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar regex = new Regex( highlightedWord, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase );Di2015NewLineforeach (var sentence in sentences)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var evaluator = new MatchEvaluator( match => Evaluators.Wrap( match, sentence, "<span class='red'>{0}</span>" ) );Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine( regex.Replace( sentence, evaluator ) );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6026582Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void GenerateWorkbookFromDB()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Make a copy of the template fileDi2015NewLine    File.Copy(HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("ReportTemplate/test.xlsx"), HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("Reports/test.xlsx"), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Open up the copied template workbookDi2015NewLine    using (SpreadsheetDocument myWorkbook = SpreadsheetDocument.Open(HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("Reports/test.xlsx"), true))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WorkbookPart workbookPart = myWorkbook.WorkbookPart;Di2015NewLine        WorksheetPart worksheetPart = workbookPart.WorksheetParts.First();Di2015NewLine        string origninalSheetId = workbookPart.GetIdOfPart(worksheetPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WorksheetPart replacementPart = workbookPart.AddNewPart<WorksheetPart>();Di2015NewLine        string replacementPartId = workbookPart.GetIdOfPart(replacementPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OpenXmlReader reader = OpenXmlReader.Create(worksheetPart);Di2015NewLine        OpenXmlWriter writer = OpenXmlWriter.Create(replacementPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Row r = new Row();Di2015NewLine        Cell c = new Cell();Di2015NewLine        string txt = "test";Di2015NewLine        c.CellValue = new CellValue(txt.ToString());Di2015NewLine        c.DataType = new EnumValue<CellValues>(CellValues.String);Di2015NewLine        //v.Text = "test";Di2015NewLine        //c.Append(v);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.ElementType == typeof(SheetData))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (reader.IsEndElement)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteStartElement(new SheetData());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int row = 0; row < 20; row++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteStartElement(r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int col = 0; col < 4; col++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        writer.WriteElement(c);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (reader.IsStartElement)Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteStartElement(reader);Di2015NewLine                else if (reader.IsEndElement)Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLine        writer.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Sheet sheet = workbookPart.Workbook.Descendants<Sheet>().Where(s => s.Id.Value.Equals(origninalSheetId)).First();Di2015NewLine            sheet.Id.Value = replacementPartId;Di2015NewLine            workbookPart.DeletePart(worksheetPart);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6028948Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MultiStream : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly byte[] _RandomBytes = "410801dd-6f14-4d68-8e0e-29686d212cb2".Select(c => (byte)c).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Queue<byte> _RollingBytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Stream _UnderlyingStream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool UnderlyingEOF = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool EOFMarker = false;Di2015NewLine    private int BufferedBytesToRead = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MultiStream(Stream UnderlyingStream)Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _UnderlyingStream = UnderlyingStream;Di2015NewLine        _RollingBytesRead = new Queue<byte>(_RandomBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanReadDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return !UnderlyingEOF || _UnderlyingStream.CanRead; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeekDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanWriteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _UnderlyingStream.CanWrite; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _UnderlyingStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long LengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int ReadByte()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (EOFMarker)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This should read the next byte from the underlying stream, check for the random bytes EOF marker, then return the next byte from the bufferDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If our buffer is smaller than the random bytes and we've not hit the EOF, then we need to fill itDi2015NewLine        while (!UnderlyingEOF && _RollingBytesRead.Count < _RandomBytes.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int BytesRead = _UnderlyingStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            if (BytesRead == -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UnderlyingEOF = true;Di2015NewLine                BufferedBytesToRead = _RollingBytesRead.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _RollingBytesRead.Enqueue((byte)BytesRead);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (EncounteredEndOfStreamBytes()) // Now check to see if the buffer matches our EOF markerDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If it does stop now, since we don't want to output any of the EOF marker.Di2015NewLine            BufferedBytesToRead = 0;Di2015NewLine            _RollingBytesRead.Clear();Di2015NewLine            EOFMarker = true;Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (UnderlyingEOF) // If we've already encountered the end of the underlying stream and have a buffer,Di2015NewLine                                // then output the next byte since it's not part of the EOF marker, it's part of the streamDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (BufferedBytesToRead != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BufferedBytesToRead--;Di2015NewLine                return _RollingBytesRead.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int ByteRead = _UnderlyingStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ByteRead == -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // We've reached the end so we should output the bufferDi2015NewLine                UnderlyingEOF = true;Di2015NewLine                BufferedBytesToRead = _RollingBytesRead.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Recurse once just to avoid repeating code aboveDi2015NewLine                return ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte BufferedByte = _RollingBytesRead.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                _RollingBytesRead.Enqueue((byte)ByteRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return BufferedByte;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool EncounteredEOF = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int BufferIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (offset > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ReadByte() == -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EncounteredEOF = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            offset--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!EncounteredEOF && count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Read the next byte (includes checks for our end of stream marker) and actually returns the buffered byte (not the next underlying stream read byte)Di2015NewLine            int ByteRead = ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ByteRead == -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buffer[BufferIndex] = (byte)ByteRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                count--;Di2015NewLine                BufferIndex++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return BufferIndex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool EncounteredEndOfStreamBytes()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_RollingBytesRead.Count != _RandomBytes.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] QueueArray = _RollingBytesRead.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _RandomBytes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_RandomBytes[i] != QueueArray[i])Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _UnderlyingStream.Write(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteStreamSeperator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write(_RandomBytes, 0, _RandomBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AdvanceToNextStream()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (UnderlyingEOF)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("No more streams");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we're not currently at an EOF marker, advance until we get to one.Di2015NewLine        while (!EOFMarker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReadByte();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EOFMarker = false;Di2015NewLine        _RollingBytesRead.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6033219Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void tokenize(PlaceHolder ph, string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = str.IndexOf('@') + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (index == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ph.Controls.Add(new Label { Text = str });Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ph.Controls.Add(new Label { Text = str.Substring(0, index - 1) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Tokens.Keys.Any(k => str.Substring(index).StartsWith(k + "@")))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int next = str.IndexOf("@", index);Di2015NewLine        string key = str.Substring(index, next - index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ph.Controls.Add(new TextBoxDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ID = "txt" + key,Di2015NewLine            Text = Tokens[key],Di2015NewLine            TextMode = TextBoxMode.MultiLine,Di2015NewLine            Rows = 2Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        index = next + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tokenize(ph, str.Substring(index));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6035022Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ConvertExact(2.0, typeof(int)));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ConvertExact(2.5, typeof(int)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static object ConvertExact(object convertFromValue, Type convertToType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object candidate = Convert.ChangeType(convertFromValue,Di2015NewLine                                              convertToType);Di2015NewLine        object reverse =  Convert.ChangeType(candidate,Di2015NewLine                                             convertFromValue.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!convertFromValue.Equals(reverse))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidCastException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return candidate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6035038Di2015UniqueSeparator// Implement an "autoscroll" routine for dragDi2015NewLine//  and drop. If the drag cursor moves to the bottomDi2015NewLine//  or top of the treeview, call the Windows APIDi2015NewLine//  SendMessage function to scroll up or down automatically.Di2015NewLineprivate void DragScroll (Di2015NewLine    object sender,Di2015NewLine    DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Set a constant to define the autoscroll regionDi2015NewLine    const Single scrollRegion = 20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // See where the cursor isDi2015NewLine    Point pt =  TreeView1.PointToClient(Cursor.Position);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // See if we need to scroll up or downDi2015NewLine    if ((pt.Y + scrollRegion) > TreeView1.Height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Call the API to scroll downDi2015NewLine        SendMessage(TreeView1.Handle, (int)277, (int)1, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (pt.Y < (TreeView1.Top + scrollRegion))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Call thje API to scroll upDi2015NewLine        SendMessage(TreeView1.Handle, (int)277, (int)0, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6035421Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double foo = 0;Di2015NewLine    var thread = new Thread(() => foo = GetFoo());Di2015NewLine    thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    string message;Di2015NewLine    if(thread.Join(1000))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        message = foo.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        message = "Process took too long";Di2015NewLine        thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    message.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic double GetFoo() {Di2015NewLine    double a = RandomProvider.Next(2, 5); Di2015NewLine    while (a == 3) { RandomProvider.Next(2, 5);} Di2015NewLine    double b = RandomProvider.Next(2, 5); Di2015NewLine    double c = b /a; Di2015NewLine    double e = RandomProvider.Next(8, 11); Di2015NewLine    while (e == 9) { RandomProvider.Next(8,11); } Di2015NewLine    double f = b / e;Di2015NewLine    return f;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6035421Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double foo = 0;Di2015NewLine    _abort = false;Di2015NewLine    var thread = new Thread(() => foo = GetFoo());Di2015NewLine    thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    string message;Di2015NewLine    if(thread.Join(1000))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        message = foo.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        message = "Process took too long";Di2015NewLine        _abort = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    message.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This could be anywhere, as long as both Main and GetFoo have access to it.Di2015NewLinebool _abort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic double GetFoo() {Di2015NewLine    double a = RandomProvider.Next(2, 5); Di2015NewLine    while (a == 3 && !_abort) { RandomProvider.Next(2, 5);} Di2015NewLine    double b = RandomProvider.Next(2, 5); Di2015NewLine    double c = b /a; Di2015NewLine    double e = RandomProvider.Next(8, 11); Di2015NewLine    while (e == 9 && !_abort) { RandomProvider.Next(8,11); } Di2015NewLine    double f = b / e;Di2015NewLine    return _abort ? 0 : f;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6036140Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Comparator for values like 123 KBDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="x">First value to compare</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="y">Second value to compare</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>0 for equal, 1 for x > y, -1 for x < y</returns>Di2015NewLine    int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Convert to stringsDi2015NewLine        string strX = null;Di2015NewLine        if (x is string)Di2015NewLine            strX = (string)x;Di2015NewLine        else if (x != null)Di2015NewLine            strX = x.ToString();Di2015NewLine        string strY = null;Di2015NewLine        if (y is string)Di2015NewLine            strY = (string)y;Di2015NewLine        else if (y != null)Di2015NewLine            strY = y.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Nulls first (null means less, since it's blank)Di2015NewLine        if (strX == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (strY == null)Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (strY == null)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the non-KB part to a numberDi2015NewLine        double numX;Di2015NewLine        double numY;Di2015NewLine        if (strX.EndsWith("KB") || strX.EndsWith("GB") || strX.EndsWith("MB"))Di2015NewLine            strX = strX.Substring(0, strX.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine        if (strX.EndsWith("Bytes"))Di2015NewLine            strX = strX.Substring(0, strX.Length - 5);Di2015NewLine        strX = strX.Trim();Di2015NewLine        double.TryParse(strX, out numX);Di2015NewLine        if (strY.EndsWith("KB") || strY.EndsWith("GB") || strY.EndsWith("MB"))Di2015NewLine            strY = strY.Substring(0, strY.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine        if (strY.EndsWith("Bytes"))Di2015NewLine            strY = strX.Substring(0, strY.Length - 5);Di2015NewLine        strY = strY.Trim();Di2015NewLine        double.TryParse(strY, out numY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compare the numbersDi2015NewLine        return numX.CompareTo(numY);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6037723Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CommandModuleProvider : IProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type Type { get { return typeof(ICommandModule); } }Di2015NewLine    public object Create(IContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var securityInfo = context.Kernel.Get<SecurityInformation>();Di2015NewLine        if (securityInfo.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine            if (securityInfo.IsCurrentUserAdministrator)Di2015NewLine                //load administrator command moduleDi2015NewLine                return context.Kernel.Get<AdministratorCommandModule>();Di2015NewLine            else if (securityInfo.IsCurrentUserModerator)Di2015NewLine                //Load moderator command moduleDi2015NewLine                return context.Kernel.Get<ModeratorCommandModule>();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                //Load user command moduleDi2015NewLine                return context.Kernel.Get<UserCommandModule>();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            //Load visitor command moduleDi2015NewLine            return context.Kernel.Get<VisitorCommandModule>();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine

6037879Di2015UniqueSeparatorWITH cte_name ( column_name [,...n] )Di2015NewLineAS (Di2015NewLine    - AnchorDi2015NewLine    CTE_query_definitionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    UNION ALLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    - Recursive portionDi2015NewLine    CTE_query_definitionDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine-- Statement using the CTEDi2015NewLineSELECT * FROM cte_nameDi2015NewLine
6037879Di2015UniqueSeparatorWith hierarchy (id, [location id], name, depth)Di2015NewLineAs (Di2015NewLine    -- selects the "root" level items.Di2015NewLine    Select ID, [LocationID], Name, 1 As depthDi2015NewLine    From dbo.LocationsDi2015NewLine    Where ID = [LocationID]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Union AllDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -- selects the descendant items.Di2015NewLine    Select child.id, child.[LocationID], child.name,Di2015NewLine        parent.depth + 1 As depthDi2015NewLine    From dbo.Locations As childDi2015NewLine    Inner Join hierarchy As parentDi2015NewLine        On child.[LocationID] = parent.IDDi2015NewLine    Where child.ID != parent.[Location ID])Di2015NewLine-- invokes the above expression.Di2015NewLineSelect *Di2015NewLineFrom hierarchyDi2015NewLine

6044058Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T> (this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{     Di2015NewLine    Random random = new Random ();     Di2015NewLine    T [] copy = source.ToArray ();      Di2015NewLine    for (int i = copy.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--) Di2015NewLine    {         Di2015NewLine        int index = random.Next (i + 1);Di2015NewLine        yield return copy [index];Di2015NewLine        copy [index] = copy [i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6049071Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] originalArray = new byte[] { 1, 2, 3 };Di2015NewLinebyte[] arrayA = originalArray;Di2015NewLinebyte[] arrayB = arrayA;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Both arrays point to the same reference, changes to arrayADi2015NewLine//or arrayB will affect both variablesDi2015NewLinearrayA[0] = 3;Di2015NewLinearrayB[2] = 1;Di2015NewLine//Both will output 3, 2, 1Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", arrayA[0], arrayA[1], arrayA[2]);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", arrayB[0], arrayB[1], arrayB[2]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Copy array - both arrays point to different referencesDi2015NewLine//Actions on arrayA will not affect arrayBDi2015NewLinearrayB = new byte[arrayA.Length];Di2015NewLinearrayA.CopyTo(arrayB, 0);Di2015NewLinearrayA[0] = 1;Di2015NewLinearrayA[2] = 3;Di2015NewLine//First will output 1,2,3, second will output 3, 2, 1Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", arrayA[0], arrayA[1], arrayA[2]);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", arrayB[0], arrayB[1], arrayB[2]);Di2015NewLine

6055385Di2015UniqueSeparator    public delegate void ProgressChangeDelegate(double Persentage, ref bool Cancel);Di2015NewLine    public delegate void Completedelegate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class CustomFileCopierDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public CustomFileCopier(string Source, string Dest)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.SourceFilePath = Source;Di2015NewLine            this.DestFilePath = Dest;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OnProgressChanged += delegate { };Di2015NewLine            OnComplete += delegate { };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Copy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[1024 * 1024]; // 1MB bufferDi2015NewLine            bool cancelFlag = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream source = new FileStream(SourceFilePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                long fileLength = source.Length;Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream dest = new FileStream(DestFilePath, FileMode.CreateNew, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    long totalBytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    int currentBlockSize = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    while ((currentBlockSize = source.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        totalBytes += currentBlockSize;Di2015NewLine                        double persentage = (double)totalBytes * 100.0 / fileLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        dest.Write(buffer, 0, currentBlockSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        cancelFlag = false;Di2015NewLine                        OnProgressChanged(persentage, ref cancelFlag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (cancelFlag == true)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Delete dest file hereDi2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OnComplete();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string SourceFilePath { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string DestFilePath { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public event ProgressChangeDelegate OnProgressChanged;Di2015NewLine        public event Completedelegate OnComplete;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6056801Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void CombineMultiplePDFs(string[] fileNames, string outFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pageOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine        int f = 0;Di2015NewLine        Document document = null;Di2015NewLine        PdfCopy writer = null;Di2015NewLine        while (f < fileNames.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we create a reader for a certain documentDi2015NewLine            PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(fileNames[f]);Di2015NewLine            reader.ConsolidateNamedDestinations();Di2015NewLine            // we retrieve the total number of pagesDi2015NewLine            int n = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine            pageOffset += n;Di2015NewLine            if (f == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // step 1: creation of a document-objectDi2015NewLine                document = new Document(reader.GetPageSizeWithRotation(1));Di2015NewLine                // step 2: we create a writer that listens to the documentDi2015NewLine                writer = new PdfCopy(document, new FileStream(outFile, FileMode.Create));Di2015NewLine                // step 3: we open the documentDi2015NewLine                document.Open();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // step 4: we add contentDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < n; )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ++i;Di2015NewLine                if (writer != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PdfImportedPage page = writer.GetImportedPage(reader, i);Di2015NewLine                    writer.AddPage(page);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            PRAcroForm form = reader.AcroForm;Di2015NewLine            if (form != null && writer != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.CopyAcroForm(reader);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            f++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // step 5: we close the documentDi2015NewLine        if (document != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            document.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6061001Di2015UniqueSeparator// Compute existing aspect ratioDi2015NewLinedouble aspectRatio = (double)image.Width / image.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Clip the desired values to the maximumsDi2015NewLinedesiredHeight = Math.Min(desiredHeight, MaxHeight);Di2015NewLinedesiredWidth = Math.Min(desiredWidth, MaxWidth);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is the aspect ratio if you used the desired values.Di2015NewLinedouble newAspect = (double)desiredWidth / desiredHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (newAspect > aspectRatio)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The new aspect ratio would make the image too tall.Di2015NewLine    // Need to adjust the height.Di2015NewLine    desiredHeight = (int)(desiredWidth / aspectRatio);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if (newAspect < aspectRatio)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The new aspect ratio would make the image too wide.Di2015NewLine    // Need to adjust the width.Di2015NewLine    desiredWidth = (int)(desiredHeight * aspectRatio);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// You can now resize the image using desiredWidth and desiredHeightDi2015NewLine

6065708Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int[,] generateGrid() // POSSIBLE UPDATE:: WHEN RESETING GRID ROW, REMEMBER PREVIOUS ORDER TO AVOID SAME COMFLICTION TWICEDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    ArrayList availableColumnNumbers = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine    ArrayList availableRowNumbers = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine    ArrayList availableNumbers = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine    int[,] grid = new int[_gridSize, _gridSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    availableColumnNumbers = resetArrayList(); // create a list that holds the numbers 1 - Grid SizeDi2015NewLine    availableRowNumbers = resetArrayList(); // create a list that holds the numbers 1 - Grid SizeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int row = 0; row < _gridSize; row++) // loop through rowsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int column = 0; column < _gridSize; column++) // loop through columnsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (row == 0) // if row to be filled if the first rowDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int position = rand.Next(availableRowNumbers.Count); // Generate a random positionDi2015NewLine                grid[row, column] = (int)availableRowNumbers[position]; // place available row numbersDi2015NewLine                availableRowNumbers.RemoveAt(position); // update available row numbersDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else // row to be filled has constraints. Fill in, taking constraints into considerationDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // update available column number, finds out what values are already in the column, and generates the only available values Di2015NewLine                availableColumnNumbers = getAvailableColumnNumbers(grid, column);Di2015NewLine                // combine available Rows and Columns to get a list of available numbers for that cellDi2015NewLine                availableNumbers = getSimilarNumbers(availableRowNumbers, availableColumnNumbers);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (availableNumbers.Count != 0) // if there are available numbers to place,Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int position = rand.Next(availableNumbers.Count);Di2015NewLine                    grid[row, column] = (int)availableNumbers[position]; // place available numberDi2015NewLine                    availableRowNumbers.Remove((int)availableNumbers[position]); // update available row numbersDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else // Confliction: There are no available numbers (restart entire row)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    grid = resetRow(grid, row); // reset the entire row where confliction occuredDi2015NewLine                    column = -1; // start again at begining of columnDi2015NewLine                    availableRowNumbers = resetArrayList(); // reset Array ListDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        availableRowNumbers = resetArrayList();// reset available row arrayDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return grid;Di2015NewLine
6065757Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    public static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        var app = new Application();Di2015NewLine        app.Run(new MainWindow());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6065815Di2015UniqueSeparatorobject value = range.Value; //the value is boxed two-dimensional arrayDi2015NewLinevar excelArray = value as object[,];Di2015NewLinevar height = excelArray.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLinevar width = excelArray.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLinevar array = new string[width, height];Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < height; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < width; j++)Di2015NewLine        array[i, j] = excelArray[i, j] as string;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6065815Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TOutput[,] ConvertAll<TInput, TOutput>(TInput[,] array, Converter<TInput, TOutput> converter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (array == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("array");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (converter == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("converter");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int height = array.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    int width = array.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine    TOutput[,] localArray = new TOutput[width, height];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < height; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < width; j++)Di2015NewLine            localArray[i, j] = converter(array[i, j]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return localArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6068238Di2015UniqueSeparator`private const string accessKeyId = "REMOVED";Di2015NewLine    private const string secretAccessKey = "REMOVED";Di2015NewLine    private static DateTime GetTimeStamp(DateTime myTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime myUniversalTime = myTime.ToUniversalTime();Di2015NewLine        DateTime myNewTime = new DateTime(myUniversalTime.Year,Di2015NewLine        myUniversalTime.Month, myUniversalTime.Day,Di2015NewLine        myUniversalTime.Hour, myUniversalTime.Minute,Di2015NewLine        myUniversalTime.Second, myUniversalTime.Millisecond);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return myNewTime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static string GetSignature(string secretAccessKey, string strOperation, DateTime myTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Encoding myEncoding = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the source string which is used to create the digestDi2015NewLine        string mySource = "AmazonS3" + strOperation + FormatTimeStamp(myTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a new Cryptography class using the Di2015NewLine        // Secret Access Key as the keyDi2015NewLine        HMACSHA1 myCrypto = new HMACSHA1(myEncoding.GetBytes(secretAccessKey));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the source string to an array of bytesDi2015NewLine        char[] mySourceArray = mySource.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        // Convert the source to a UTF8 encoded array of bytesDi2015NewLine        byte[] myUTF8Bytes = myEncoding.GetBytes(mySourceArray);Di2015NewLine        // Calculate the digest Di2015NewLine        byte[] strDigest = myCrypto.ComputeHash(myUTF8Bytes);Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(strDigest);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static string FormatTimeStamp(DateTime myTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime myUniversalTime = myTime.ToUniversalTime();Di2015NewLine        return myUniversalTime.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd\\\\THH:mm:ss.fff\\\\Z", System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine 6069959Di2015UniqueSeparatorActivator.CreateInstance<T>
6069959Di2015UniqueSeparatornew T()
6069959Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int IterationCount = 100000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // warmupDi2015NewLine    Test1();Di2015NewLine    Test2();Di2015NewLine    Test3();Di2015NewLine    Test4();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // profile Activator.CreateInstance<T>()Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < IterationCount; index++)Di2015NewLine        Test1();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("Test1 - Activator.CreateInstance<T>()");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // profile new T()Di2015NewLine    sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < IterationCount; index++)Di2015NewLine        Test2();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("Test2 - new T()");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // profile DelegateDi2015NewLine    sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < IterationCount; index++)Di2015NewLine        Test3();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("Test3 - Delegate");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // profile BaselineDi2015NewLine    sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < IterationCount; index++)Di2015NewLine        Test4();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("Baseline");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Test1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var obj = Activator.CreateInstance<TestClass>();Di2015NewLine    GC.KeepAlive(obj);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Test2()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var obj = new TestClass();Di2015NewLine    GC.KeepAlive(obj);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Func<TestClass> Create = delegateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new TestClass();Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Test3()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var obj = Create();Di2015NewLine    GC.KeepAlive(obj);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTestClass x = new TestClass();Di2015NewLinepublic void Test4()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    GC.KeepAlive(x);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TestClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6070537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IOrderedQueryable<T> ExecuteOrderBys<T>(this IQueryable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(!this.Orderings.Any())Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("You need to add orderings");Di2015NewLine    IOrderedQueryable<T> ordered;Di2015NewLine    if (this.Orderings[0].Descending)Di2015NewLine        ordered = LinqHelper.OrderByDescending(source, this.Orderings[0].Field);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        ordered = LinqHelper.OrderBy(source, this.Orderings[0].Field);Di2015NewLine    foreach(var ordering in this.Orderings.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ordering.Descending)Di2015NewLine            ordered = LinqHelper.ThenByDescending(source, ordering.Field);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            ordered = LinqHelper.ThenBy(source, ordering.Field);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ordered;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6074193Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetDefaultValue<T>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, MyClass>> propertySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberExpression = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (expression.Body.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine            // This is the default case where the Di2015NewLine            // expression is simply member access.Di2015NewLine            memberExpression Di2015NewLine                = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Convert:Di2015NewLine            // This case deals with conversions that Di2015NewLine            // may have occured due to typing.Di2015NewLine            UnaryExpression unaryExpression Di2015NewLine                = expression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (unaryExpression != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                memberExpression Di2015NewLine                    = unaryExpression.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemberInfo member = memberExpression.Member;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check for field and property types. Di2015NewLine    // All other types are not supported by attribute model.Di2015NewLine    switch (member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Member is not property");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var property = (PropertyInfo)member;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var attribute = propertyDi2015NewLine        .GetCustomAttribute(typeof(DefaultValueAttribute)) Di2015NewLine            as DefaultValueAttribute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(attribute != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)attribute.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6078111Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT  #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine    #timesheet.employee,Di2015NewLine    MIN(#timesheet.StartDate) AS [Start Date],Di2015NewLine    MAX(#timesheet.endDate) AS [End Date],Di2015NewLine    SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate, #timesheet.endDate)) / 60 AS [Hours],Di2015NewLine    SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate, #timesheet.endDate)) % 60 AS [Minutes]Di2015NewLineFROM    #timesheetDi2015NewLineGROUP BY #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine        #timesheet.employeeDi2015NewLine

6078111Di2015UniqueSeparator SELECT Task,Di2015NewLine    Employee,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Sunday], 0) AS Sunday,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Monday], 0) AS Monday,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Tuesday], 0) AS Tuesday,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Wednesday], 0) AS Wendesday,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Thursday], 0) AS Thursday,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Friday], 0) AS Friday,Di2015NewLine    ISNULL([Saturday], 0) AS SaturdayDi2015NewLine FROM   ( SELECT    #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine                #timesheet.employee,Di2015NewLine                dbo.GetWeekDayNameOfDate(#timesheet.StartDate) AS [Day],Di2015NewLine                SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate, #timesheet.endDate))Di2015NewLine                / 60 AS [Hours],Di2015NewLine                SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate, #timesheet.endDate))Di2015NewLine                % 60 AS [Minutes]Di2015NewLine      FROM      #timesheetDi2015NewLine      GROUP BY  #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine                #timesheet.employee,Di2015NewLine                dbo.GetWeekDayNameOfDate(#timesheet.StartDate)Di2015NewLine    ) p PIVOT ( SUM(Hours) FOR [DAY] IN ( [Sunday], [Monday], [Tuesday],Di2015NewLine                                          [Wednesday], [Thursday],Di2015NewLine                                          [Friday], [Saturday] ) ) AS PivotTableDi2015NewLine

6078111Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT  summary.Task,Di2015NewLine    summary.employee,Di2015NewLine    summary.[Start Date],Di2015NewLine    summary.[End Date],Di2015NewLine    details.Sunday,Di2015NewLine    details.Monday,Di2015NewLine    details.Tuesday,Di2015NewLine    details.Wendesday,Di2015NewLine    details.Thursday,Di2015NewLine    details.Friday,Di2015NewLine    details.Saturday,Di2015NewLine    summary.Hours,Di2015NewLine    summary.MinutesDi2015NewLine FROM    ( SELECT    #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine                #timesheet.employee,Di2015NewLine                MIN(#timesheet.StartDate) AS [Start Date],Di2015NewLine                MAX(#timesheet.endDate) AS [End Date],Di2015NewLine                SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate, #timesheet.endDate))Di2015NewLine                / 60 AS [Hours],Di2015NewLine                SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate, #timesheet.endDate))Di2015NewLine                % 60 AS [Minutes]Di2015NewLine      FROM      #timesheetDi2015NewLine      GROUP BY  #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine                #timesheet.employeeDi2015NewLine    ) summaryDi2015NewLine    INNER JOIN ( SELECT Task,Di2015NewLine                        Employee,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Sunday], 0) AS Sunday,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Monday], 0) AS Monday,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Tuesday], 0) AS Tuesday,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Wednesday], 0) AS Wendesday,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Thursday], 0) AS Thursday,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Friday], 0) AS Friday,Di2015NewLine                        ISNULL([Saturday], 0) AS SaturdayDi2015NewLine                 FROM   ( SELECT    #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine                                    #timesheet.employee,Di2015NewLine                                    dbo.GetWeekDayNameOfDate(#timesheet.StartDate) AS [Day],Di2015NewLine                                    SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate,Di2015NewLine                                                 #timesheet.endDate)) / 60 AS [Hours],Di2015NewLine                                    SUM(DATEDIFF(n, #timesheet.StartDate,Di2015NewLine                                                 #timesheet.endDate)) % 60 AS [Minutes]Di2015NewLine                          FROM      #timesheetDi2015NewLine                          GROUP BY  #timesheet.Task,Di2015NewLine [Monday], [Tuesday], [Wednesday], [Thursday], [Friday], [Saturday] ) ) AS PivotTableDi2015NewLine               ) details ON summary.Task = details.TaskDi2015NewLine                            AND summary.Employee = details.EmployeeDi2015NewLine

6080363Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// The KeyStoreEventHandler is used by the KeyPress event of the KeyStoreDi2015NewLine/// class. It notifies listeners of a named key press.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="name">The name of the key.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void KeyStoreEventHandler(string name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass KeyStore : IMessageFilterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // InteropDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern short GetKeyState(Keys key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Windows message constantsDi2015NewLine    private const int WM_KEYDOWN = 0x100;Di2015NewLine    private const int WM_KEYUP = 0x101;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The singleton instanceDi2015NewLine    private static KeyStore s_instance = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The modifier keysDi2015NewLine    private bool _shift = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool _control = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The definitionsDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Keys, string> _definitions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The KeyPressed EventDi2015NewLine    public event KeyStoreEventHandler KeyPress;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Adds a key definition to the store.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="name">The name of the key.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">The key</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="modifiers">The modifiers (shift, control)</param>Di2015NewLine    public void AddKeyDefinition(string name, Keys key, Keys modifiers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Keys combined = key | modifiers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _definitions[combined] = name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The filter message.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public bool PreFilterMessage(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool handled = false;Di2015NewLine        Keys key = Keys.None;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (m.Msg)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case WM_KEYUP:Di2015NewLine                key = (Keys)m.WParam;Di2015NewLine                handled = HandleModifier(key, false);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case WM_KEYDOWN:Di2015NewLine                key = (Keys)m.WParam;Di2015NewLine                handled = HandleModifier(key, true);Di2015NewLine                if (false == handled)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If one of the defined keys was pressed then weDi2015NewLine                    // raise an event.Di2015NewLine                    handled = HandleDefinedKey(key);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return handled;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Compares a key against the definitions, and raises an eventDi2015NewLine    /// if there is a match.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">The key</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if the key was one of the defined key combinations.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private bool HandleDefinedKey(Keys key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool handled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Keys combined = key;Di2015NewLine        if (_shift) combined |= Keys.Shift;Di2015NewLine        if (_control) combined |= Keys.Control;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we have found a matching combination then weDi2015NewLine        // raise an event.Di2015NewLine        string name = null;Di2015NewLine        if (true == _definitions.TryGetValue(combined, out name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OnKeyPress(name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return handled;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Attempt to handle a modifier key, and return a boolean indicating if a modifier key wasDi2015NewLine    /// handled.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">The key</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="isDown">True if the key is pressed; False if it is released.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if a modifier key was selected; False otherwise.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private bool HandleModifier(Keys key, bool isDown)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool handled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case Keys.RControlKey:Di2015NewLine            case Keys.ControlKey:Di2015NewLine                _control = isDown;Di2015NewLine                handled = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case Keys.RShiftKey:Di2015NewLine            case Keys.ShiftKey:Di2015NewLine                _shift = isDown;Di2015NewLine                handled = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return handled;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raises the KeyPress event.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="name">The name of the key.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void OnKeyPress(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Raise eventDi2015NewLine        if (null != KeyPress) KeyPress(name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check if modifier keys were released in the mean time.Di2015NewLine        _control =Di2015NewLine            -127 == GetKeyState(Keys.ControlKey) ||Di2015NewLine            -127 == GetKeyState(Keys.RControlKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _shift =Di2015NewLine            -127 == GetKeyState(Keys.ShiftKey) ||Di2015NewLine            -127 == GetKeyState(Keys.RShiftKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the singleton instance.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static KeyStore InstanceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (null == s_instance) Di2015NewLine                s_instance = new KeyStore();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return s_instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The constructor is private because this is a singleton class.Di2015NewLine    private KeyStore()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _definitions = new Dictionary<Keys, string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6091783Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This class implements a filter for the Windows.Forms message pump allowing aDi2015NewLine/// specific message to be forwarded to the Control specified in the constructor.Di2015NewLine/// Adding and removing of the filter is done automatically.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class MessageForwarder : NativeWindow, IMessageFilterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region FieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Control _Control;Di2015NewLine    private Control _PreviousParent;Di2015NewLine    private HashSet<int> _Messages;Di2015NewLine    private bool _IsMouseOverControl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // FieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MessageForwarder(Control control, int message)Di2015NewLine        : this(control, new int[] { message }) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MessageForwarder(Control control, IEnumerable<int> messages)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _Control = control;Di2015NewLine        AssignHandle(control.Handle);Di2015NewLine        _Messages = new HashSet<int>(messages);Di2015NewLine        _PreviousParent = control.Parent;Di2015NewLine        _IsMouseOverControl = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        control.ParentChanged += new EventHandler(control_ParentChanged);Di2015NewLine        control.MouseEnter += new EventHandler(control_MouseEnter);Di2015NewLine        control.MouseLeave += new EventHandler(control_MouseLeave);Di2015NewLine        control.Leave += new EventHandler(control_Leave);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (control.Parent != null)Di2015NewLine            Application.AddMessageFilter(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IMessageFilter membersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool PreFilterMessage(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_Messages.Contains(m.Msg) && _Control.CanFocus && !_Control.FocusedDi2015NewLine            && _IsMouseOverControl)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m.HWnd = _Control.Handle;Di2015NewLine            WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // IMessageFilterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Event handlersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void control_ParentChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_Control.Parent == null)Di2015NewLine            Application.RemoveMessageFilter(this);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_PreviousParent == null)Di2015NewLine                Application.AddMessageFilter(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _PreviousParent = _Control.Parent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void control_MouseEnter(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _IsMouseOverControl = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void control_MouseLeave(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _IsMouseOverControl = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void control_Leave(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _IsMouseOverControl = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // Event handlersDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //First we want to get a list of all of the DIV inside of the container div for my_grid:Di2015NewLine        List<System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl> listOfDivs = this.my_grid.Controls.OfType<System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>().ToList<System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>();Di2015NewLine        //because the array is AxA we need the square root of the count of divs and this gives us the upper range of the array values:Di2015NewLine        double A = Math.Sqrt(listOfDivs.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //these nested for loops extract every value from your grid and puts them into the "results" listDi2015NewLine        //of course if you want to do something else with them that works too... see button2_click for an alternative...Di2015NewLine        for (double X = 0; 6092298Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool LessThan3DecimalPlaces(decimal dec)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    decimal value = dec * 1000;Di2015NewLine    return value == Math.Floor(value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(LessThan3DecimalPlaces(1m * 0.00025m));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(LessThan3DecimalPlaces(4000m * 0.00025m));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6092298Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic decimal CountDecimalPlaces(decimal dec)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] bits = Decimal.GetBits(dec);Di2015NewLine    int exponent = bits[3] >> 16;Di2015NewLine    int result = exponent;Di2015NewLine    long lowDecimal = bits[0] | (bits[1] >> 8);Di2015NewLine    while ((lowDecimal % 10) == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result--;Di2015NewLine        lowDecimal /= 10;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Foo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(CountDecimalPlaces(1.6m));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(CountDecimalPlaces(1.600m));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(CountDecimalPlaces(decimal.MaxValue));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(CountDecimalPlaces(1m * 0.00025m));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(CountDecimalPlaces(4000m * 0.00025m));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6092714Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLineusing Sd = System.Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void FillTableData(Sd.DataTable table, Worksheet worksheet, Range cells)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var com = new ComObjectManager())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var firstCell = GetFirstCell(com, cells);Di2015NewLine        var beginCell = com.Get<Range>(() => (Range)cells.Item[2, 1]);Di2015NewLine        var endCell = GetLastContiguousCell(com, cells, firstCell);Di2015NewLine        if (beginCell.Value == null) return;Di2015NewLine        var range = GetRange(com, cells, beginCell, endCell);Di2015NewLine        var data = (object[,])range.Value;Di2015NewLine        var rowCount = data.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        for (var rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < rowCount; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var values = new object[table.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine            for (var columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < table.Columns.Count; columnIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var value = data[rowIndex + 1, columnIndex + 1];Di2015NewLine                values[columnIndex] = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Range GetFirstCell(ComObjectManager com, Range cells)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return com.Get<Range>(() => (Range)cells.Item[1, 1]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Range GetLastContiguousCell(ComObjectManager com, Range cells, Range beginCell)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bottomCell = com.Get<Range>(() => beginCell.End[XlDirection.xlDown]);Di2015NewLine    var rightCell = com.Get<Range>(() => beginCell.End[XlDirection.xlToRight]);Di2015NewLine    return com.Get<Range>(() => (Range)cells.Item[bottomCell.Row, rightCell.Column]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6092714Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ComObjectManager : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stack<object> _comObjects = new Stack<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TComObject Get<TComObject>(Func<TComObject> getter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var comObject = getter();Di2015NewLine        _comObjects.Push(comObject);Di2015NewLine        return comObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (_comObjects.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            Marshal.ReleaseComObject(_comObjects.Pop());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6093903Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar g_elem = '';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction changeStatus(elem, type) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    g_elem = elem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // let's say we are changingDi2015NewLine    $(elem).val("changing...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // let's get the idDi2015NewLine    var id = $(elem).prent().find("#hfId").val();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // let's send info to our page to precess and wait for an answerDi2015NewLine    $.get('ajax/changeStatus.ashx', Di2015NewLine          { changeFrom: type, id: id },Di2015NewLine          function(data) {Di2015NewLine              // got the answer, let's show itDi2015NewLine              $(g_elem).val(data);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6093978Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Func<R> HandleInvoke<T, R>(this Func<T, R> function, T arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        R retv = default(R);Di2015NewLine        bool completed = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object sync = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IAsyncResult asyncResult = function.BeginInvoke(arg, Di2015NewLine            iAsyncResult =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock(sync)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    completed = true;Di2015NewLine                    retv = function.EndInvoke(iAsyncResult);Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Pulse(sync); // wake a waiting thread is there is oneDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            , null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (sync)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!completed) // if not called before the callback completedDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Wait(sync); // wait for it to pulse the sync objectDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return retv;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6094092Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap bmp = new Bitmap("SomeImage");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Lock the bitmap's bits.  Di2015NewLineRectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLineBitmapData bmpData = bmp.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the address of the first line.Di2015NewLineIntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap.Di2015NewLineint bytes = bmpData.Stride * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLinebyte[] rgbValues = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLinebyte[] r = new byte[bytes / 3];Di2015NewLinebyte[] g = new byte[bytes / 3];Di2015NewLinebyte[] b = new byte[bytes / 3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLineMarshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint count = 0;Di2015NewLineint stride = bmpData.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int column = 0; column < bmpData.Height; column++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int row = 0; row < bmpData.Width; row++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        b[count] = (byte)(rgbValues[(column * stride) + (row * 3)]) Di2015NewLine        g[count] = (byte)(rgbValues[(column * stride) + (row * 3) + 1]);Di2015NewLine        r[count++] = (byte)(rgbValues[(column * stride) + (row * 3) + 2]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6094568Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class JsonModelBinder : DefaultModelBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override object BindModel(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!IsJSONRequest(controllerContext))Di2015NewLine            return base.BindModel(controllerContext, bindingContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the JSON data that's been postedDi2015NewLine        var jsonStringData = new StreamReader(controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.InputStream).ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wrap numericsDi2015NewLine        jsonStringData = Regex.Replace(jsonStringData, @"(?<=:)\\s{0,4}(?<num>[\\d\\.]+)\\s{0,4}(?=[,|\\]|\\}]+)", "\\"${num}\\"");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use the built-in serializer to do the work for usDi2015NewLine        return new JavaScriptSerializer().Deserialize(jsonStringData, bindingContext.ModelMetadata.ModelType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsJSONRequest(ControllerContext controllerContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var contentType = controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.ContentType;Di2015NewLine        return contentType.Contains("application/json");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6095101Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private SynchronizationContext _synchronizationContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        //Client must be careful to create sync context somehwere they are sure to be on main threadDi2015NewLine        _synchronizationContext = AsyncOperationManager.SynchronizationContext;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Callback method implementation - must be of this formDi2015NewLine    public void ReceiveThreadData(object threadData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This callback now exeutes on the main thread.Di2015NewLine        // Can use directly in UI without errorDi2015NewLine        this.listBoxMain.Items.Add((string)threadData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DoSomeThreadWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Thread needs callback and sync context so it must be wrapped in a class.Di2015NewLine        SendOrPostCallback callback = new SendOrPostCallback(ReceiveThreadData);Di2015NewLine        SomeThreadTask task = new SomeThreadTask(_synchronizationContext, callback);Di2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread(task.ExecuteThreadTask);Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DoSomeThreadWork();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6095101Di2015UniqueSeparator/// SomeThreadTask defines the work a thread needs to do and also provides any data ///required along with callback pointers etc.Di2015NewLine/// Populate a new SomeThreadTask instance with a synch context and callnbackl along with ///any data the thread needsDi2015NewLine/// then start the thread to execute the task.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class SomeThreadTaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string _taskId;Di2015NewLine    private SendOrPostCallback _completedCallback;Di2015NewLine    private SynchronizationContext _synchronizationContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get instance of a delegate used to notify the main thread when done.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal SendOrPostCallback CompletedCallbackDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _completedCallback; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get SynchronizationContext for main thread.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal SynchronizationContext SynchronizationContextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _synchronizationContext; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Thread entry point function.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void ExecuteThreadTask()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Just sleep instead of doing any real workDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string message = "This is some spoof data from thread work.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Execute callback on synch context to tell main thread this task is done.Di2015NewLine        SynchronizationContext.Post(CompletedCallback, (object)message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SomeThreadTask(SynchronizationContext synchronizationContext, SendOrPostCallback callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _synchronizationContext = synchronizationContext;Di2015NewLine        _completedCallback = callback;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6099257Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FormatHours(string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Match m = Regex.Match(value, @"^(?<hours>\\d{1,2}) h (?<minutes>\\d{1,2}) m$");Di2015NewLine    if (m.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hours = int.Parse(m.Groups["hours"].Value);Di2015NewLine        int minutes = int.Parse(m.Groups["minutes"].Value);Di2015NewLine        if (hours >= 0 && hours < 24 && minutes >= 0 && minutes < 60)Di2015NewLine            return string.Concat(hours, ".", minutes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
