6099687Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace CustomModelBindersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Override for DefaultModelBinder in order to implement fixes to its behavior.Di2015NewLine    /// This model binder inherits from the default model binder. All this does is override the default one,Di2015NewLine    /// check if the property is an enum, if so then use custom binding logic to correctly map the enum. If not,Di2015NewLine    /// we simply invoke the base model binder (DefaultModelBinder) and let it continue binding as normal.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class EnumModelBinder : DefaultModelBinderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fix for the default model binder's failure to decode enum types when binding to JSON.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        protected override object GetPropertyValue(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext,Di2015NewLine            PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, IModelBinder propertyBinder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propertyType = propertyDescriptor.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            if (propertyType.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var providerValue = bindingContext.ValueProvider.GetValue(bindingContext.ModelName);Di2015NewLine                if (null != providerValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var value = providerValue.RawValue;Di2015NewLine                    if (null != value)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var valueType = value.GetType();Di2015NewLine                        if (!valueType.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            return Enum.ToObject(propertyType, value);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return base.GetPropertyValue(controllerContext, bindingContext, propertyDescriptor, propertyBinder);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6103177Di2015UniqueSeparator// determine which elements we consider the sameDi2015NewLine//Di2015NewLineprivate static bool AreEquivalent(XElement a, XElement b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(a.Name != b.Name) return false;Di2015NewLine    if(!a.HasAttributes && !b.HasAttributes) return true;Di2015NewLine    if(!a.HasAttributes || !b.HasAttributes) return false;Di2015NewLine    if(a.Attributes().Count() != b.Attributes().Count()) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return a.Attributes().All(attA => b.Attributes(attA.Name)Di2015NewLine        .Count(attB => attB.Value == attA.Value) != 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Merge "merged" document B into "source" ADi2015NewLine//Di2015NewLineprivate static void MergeElements(XElement parentA, XElement parentB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // merge per-element content from parentB into parentADi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    foreach (XElement childB in parentB.DescendantNodes())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // merge childB with first equivalent childADi2015NewLine        // equivalent childB1, childB2,.. will be combinedDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        bool isMatchFound = false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (XElement childA in parentA.Descendants())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (AreEquivalent(childA, childB))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MergeElements(childA, childB);Di2015NewLine                isMatchFound = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if there is no equivalent childA, add childB into parentADi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        if (!isMatchFound) parentA.Add(childB);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6103618Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<TResult> MergeJoin_OneToOne<TLeft, TRight, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TLeft> leftCollection,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TRight> rightCollection,Di2015NewLine        Func<TLeft, TRight, int> comparison,Di2015NewLine        Func<TLeft, TResult> onlyLeftSelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TRight, TResult> onlyRightSelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TLeft, TRight, TResult> bothSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return MergeJoin_OneToOne_Impl(leftCollection, rightCollection, comparison, onlyLeftSelector, onlyRightSelector, bothSelector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<TResult> MergeJoin_OneToOne_Impl<TLeft, TRight, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TLeft> leftCollection,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TRight> rightCollection,Di2015NewLine        Func<TLeft, TRight, int> comparison,Di2015NewLine        Func<TLeft, TResult> onlyLeftSelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TRight, TResult> onlyRightSelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TLeft, TRight, TResult> bothSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (leftCollection == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("leftCollection");Di2015NewLine        if (rightCollection == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("rightCollection");Di2015NewLine        if (comparison == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("comparison");Di2015NewLine        if (onlyLeftSelector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("onlyLeftSelector");Di2015NewLine        if (onlyRightSelector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("onlyRightSelector");Di2015NewLine        if (bothSelector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("bothSelector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var leftEnum = leftCollection.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        using (var rightEnum = rightCollection.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!leftEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (rightEnum.MoveNext()) yield return onlyRightSelector(rightEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!rightEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return onlyLeftSelector(leftEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                } while (leftEnum.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int cmp = comparison(leftEnum.Current, rightEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                if (cmp == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return bothSelector(leftEnum.Current, rightEnum.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!leftEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        while (rightEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return onlyRightSelector(rightEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (!rightEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        doDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return onlyLeftSelector(leftEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                        } while (leftEnum.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (cmp < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return onlyLeftSelector(leftEnum.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!leftEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        doDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return onlyRightSelector(rightEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                        } while (rightEnum.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return onlyRightSelector(rightEnum.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!rightEnum.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        doDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return onlyLeftSelector(leftEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine                        } while (leftEnum.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6108060Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void DownloadFile(string fname, bool forceDownload)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string path = fname;Di2015NewLine    if (fname.StartsWith("~"))Di2015NewLine        path = Server.MapPath(fname);Di2015NewLine    string name = Path.GetFileName(path);Di2015NewLine    string ext = Path.GetExtension(path);Di2015NewLine    string type = "";Di2015NewLine    // set known types based on file extension  Di2015NewLine    if (ext != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (ext.ToLower())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ".htm":Di2015NewLine            case ".html":Di2015NewLine                type = "text/HTML";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ".txt":Di2015NewLine                type = "text/plain";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ".pdf":Di2015NewLine                type = "Application/pdf";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ".doc":Di2015NewLine            case ".rtf":Di2015NewLine                type = "Application/msword";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ".exe":Di2015NewLine                type = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ".zip":Di2015NewLine                type = "application/zip";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (forceDownload)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Response.AppendHeader("content-disposition",Di2015NewLine            "attachment; filename=" + name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(type))Di2015NewLine        Response.ContentType = type;Di2015NewLine    Response.WriteFile(path);Di2015NewLine    Response.End();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6117856Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Enum
6117856Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> GetAllEnums<T>()Di2015NewLine    where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(T).BaseType != typeof(Enum)) throw new ArgumentException("T must be an Enum type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var values = Enum.GetValues(typeof(T)).Cast<int>().ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var valuesInverted = values.Select(v => ~v).ToArray(); Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    int max = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        max |= values[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= max; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int unaccountedBits = i;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < valuesInverted.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unaccountedBits &= valuesInverted[j];Di2015NewLine            if (unaccountedBits == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add((T)(object)i);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Check for zeroDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Enum.GetName(typeof(T), (T)(object)0)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Remove((T)(object)0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Remove((T)(object)0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6120368Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string PreProcessXml( string xml )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // this list could be read from a config fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Tuple<string, string>> replacements = new List<Tuple<string, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Important: if there are VALID uses of an ampersand in your document, Di2015NewLine    // this may invalidate them! Perform a more elaborate check using a Di2015NewLine    // regex, or ensure that there are no valid entities already in the document.Di2015NewLine    replacements.Add( new Tuple<string, string>( "&", "&" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    replacements.Add( new Tuple<string, string>( "\\"", """ ) );Di2015NewLine    replacements.Add( new Tuple<string, string>( "\\'", "'" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( var replacement in replacements )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xml = xml .Replace( replacement.Item1, replacement.Item2 );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return xml;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6121015Di2015UniqueSeparator// Check if there was no errorDi2015NewLine    if (e.Error == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Streams are a way to read/write information from/to somewhereDi2015NewLine// without having to manage buffer allocation and suchDi2015NewLine        Stream responseStream = e.Result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// StreamReader is a class making it easier to read from a streamDi2015NewLine        StreamReader responseReader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// read everything that was written to a stream and convert it to a string usingDi2015NewLine// the character encoding that was specified for the stream/reader.Di2015NewLine        string response = responseReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create an array of the string by using "},{" as delimiterDi2015NewLine// string.Split would be more efficient and more straightforward.Di2015NewLine        string[] split1 = Regex.Split(response, "},{");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create a list of the array. Lists makes it easier to work with arraysDi2015NewLine// since you do not have to move elements manually or take care of allocationsDi2015NewLine        List<string> pri1 = new List<string>(split1);Di2015NewLine        pri1.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get the last item in the array. It would be more efficient to use .Length insteadDi2015NewLine// of Count()Di2015NewLine        string last = pri1[pri1.Count() - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// remove the last itemDi2015NewLine        pri1.Remove(last);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine

6121428Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] items = {"A", "B", "C", "D"};Di2015NewLine        bool[] bits = new bool[items.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < bits.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bits[i] = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (!bits.All(x => x))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listBox1.Items.Add(string.Join(", ", GetCombination(items, bits)));Di2015NewLine            AddBit(bits, bits.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string[] GetCombination(string[] items, bool[] bits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> combination = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < bits.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (bits[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                combination.Add(items[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return combination.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddBit(bool[] bits, int pos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pos < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // overflow :)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (bits[pos])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bits[pos] = false;Di2015NewLine            AddBit(bits, pos - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bits[pos] = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6122854Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TemperatureConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly IDictionary<Tuple<string, string>, Func<double, double>> ConverterMap =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<Tuple<string, string>, Func<double, double>>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            { Tuple.Create("celsius", "kelvin"), t => t + 273 },Di2015NewLine            // add similar lines to convert from/to other measurementsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double Convert(double degrees, string fromType, string toType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fromType = fromType.ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine        toType = toType.ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine        if (fromType == toType) {Di2015NewLine            return degrees; // no conversion necessaryDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ConverterMap[Tuple.Create(fromType, toType)](degrees);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6123059Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Wrap the creation of the OpenFileDialog instance in a using statement,Di2015NewLine    // rather than manually calling the Dispose method to ensure proper disposalDi2015NewLine    using (OpenFileDialog dlg = new OpenFileDialog())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dlg.Title = "Open Image";Di2015NewLine        dlg.Filter = "bmp files (*.bmp)|*.bmp";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (dlg.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PictureBox PictureBox1 = new PictureBox();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a new Bitmap object from the picture file on disk,Di2015NewLine            // and assign that to the PictureBox.Image propertyDi2015NewLine            PictureBox1.Image = new Bitmap(dlg.FileName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6133157Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataTable LINQToDataTable<T>(IEnumerable<T> varlist)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable dtReturn = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // column names Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] oProps = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (varlist == null) Di2015NewLine        return dtReturn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T rec in varlist)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Use reflection to get property names, to create table, Only first Di2015NewLine        // time, others will follow Di2015NewLine        if (oProps == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oProps = ((Type)rec.GetType()).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo pi in oProps)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type colType = pi.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((colType.IsGenericType) && Di2015NewLine                    (colType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    colType = colType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                dtReturn.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(pi.Name, colType));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DataRow dr = dtReturn.NewRow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo pi in oProps)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dr[pi.Name] = pi.GetValue(rec, null)==null ? DBNull.Value Di2015NewLine                                                       : pi.GetValue(rec,null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dtReturn.Rows.Add(dr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dtReturn;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6133783Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MvcHtmlString EnumDropDownListFor<TModel, TEnum>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TEnum>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ModelMetadata metadata = ModelMetadata.FromLambdaExpression(expression, htmlHelper.ViewData);Di2015NewLine    Type enumType = GetNonNullableModelType(metadata);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TEnum> values = Enum.GetValues(enumType).Cast<TEnum>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TypeConverter converter = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(enumType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<SelectListItem> items =Di2015NewLine        from value in valuesDi2015NewLine        select new SelectListItemDi2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       Text = converter.ConvertToString(value), Di2015NewLine                       Value = value.ToString(), Di2015NewLine                       Selected = value.Equals(metadata.Model)Di2015NewLine                   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (metadata.IsNullableValueType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        items = SingleEmptyItem.Concat(items);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return htmlHelper.DropDownListFor(Di2015NewLine        expression,Di2015NewLine        itemsDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6135143Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected string ViewContent(string view, Di2015NewLine  string controller, ViewDataDictionary viewData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var routeData = new System.Web.Routing.RouteData(Di2015NewLine    RouteData.Route, RouteData.RouteHandler);Di2015NewLine  foreach (var item in RouteData.Values)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    routeData.Values.Add(item.Key, item.Value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  //then overwrite the controller - not the action, thoughDi2015NewLine  routeData.Values["controller"] = controller;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var controllerContext = new ControllerContext(Di2015NewLine    HttpContext, Di2015NewLine    routeData, Di2015NewLine    this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ViewEngineResult result = ViewEngines.Engines.FindView(Di2015NewLine    controllerContext, Di2015NewLine    view, Di2015NewLine    null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string content = null;Di2015NewLine  if (result.View != null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (StringWriter output = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      ViewContext viewContext = new ViewContext(Di2015NewLine        controllerContext, result.View, viewData, TempData, output);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      viewContext.View.Render(viewContext, output);Di2015NewLine      result.ViewEngine.ReleaseView(ControllerContext, viewContext.View);Di2015NewLine      content = output.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return content;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException("Can't find view");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6140980Di2015UniqueSeparator public static DateTime NthOf(this DateTime CurDate, int Occurrence , DayOfWeek Day)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     var fday = new DateTime(CurDate.Year, CurDate.Month, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     var fOc = fday.DayOfWeek == Day ? fday : fday.AddDays(Day - fday.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine     // CurDate = 2011.10.1 Occurance = 1, Day = Friday >> 2011.09.30 FIX. Di2015NewLine     if (fOc.Month < CurDate.Month) Occurrence = Occurrence+1;Di2015NewLine     return fOc.AddDays(7 * (Occurrence - 1));Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

This may happen ifDi2015NewLine    /// a property's name was changed but not the parameter of the property'sDi2015NewLine    /// invocation of <see cref="OnPropertyChanged"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="propertyName">The name of the changed property.</param>Di2015NewLine    [Conditional("DEBUG")]Di2015NewLine    private void VerifyProperty(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //look for a *public* property with the specified nameDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo pi = type.GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (pi == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //there is no matching property - notify the developerDi2015NewLine            string msg = "OnPropertyChanged was invoked with invalid property name {0}: ";Di2015NewLine            msg += "{0} is not a public property of {1}.";Di2015NewLine            msg = String.Format(msg, propertyName, type.FullName);Di2015NewLine            Debug.Fail(msg);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6142221Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Retrieves a list of messages from the data context for a user.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="username">The name of the user.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="page">The page number.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="itemsPerPage">The number of items to display per page.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An enumerable list of messages.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Message> GetMessagesBy_Username(string username, int page, int itemsPerPage, bool sent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var query = _dataContext.MessagesDi2015NewLine            .Where(UserSelector(username, sent))Di2015NewLine            .OrderByDescending(x => x.SentDate)Di2015NewLine            .Skip(itemsPerPage * (page - 1))Di2015NewLine            .Take(itemsPerPage);Di2015NewLine        return query;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6142221Di2015UniqueSeparatorUserSelector(string, bool)
6142221Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Builds an expression to be reused in a LINQ query.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="username">The name of the user.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sent">True if retrieving sent messages.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An expression to be used in a LINQ query.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Expression<Func<Message, bool>> UserSelector(string username, bool sent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x => ((sent ? x.FromUser : x.ToUser).Username.ToLower() == username.ToLower()) && (sent ? !x.SenderDeleted : !x.RecipientDeleted);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6142890Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string FormatAsPhoneNumber( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if ( s == null ) throw new ArgumentNullException() ;Di2015NewLine  if ( s.Length > 10 ) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException() ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder() ;Di2015NewLine  int           p  = 0 ;Di2015NewLine  int           remaining = s.Length ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if ( remaining > 7 )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int areaCodeLength = remaining - 7 ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append("(").Append(s.Substring(p,areaCodeLength)).Append(") ") ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    p         += areaCodeLength ;Di2015NewLine    remaining -= areaCodeLength ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if ( remaining > 4 )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int exchangeLength = remaining - 4 ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(s.Substring(p,exchangeLength)).Append("-") ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    p         += exchangeLength ;Di2015NewLine    remaining -= exchangeLength ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  sb.Append(s.Substring(p) ) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string formatted = sb.ToString() ;Di2015NewLine  return formatted ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6143618Di2015UniqueSeparator static public string RSADecrypt(string cipherText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UnicodeEncoding ByteConverter = new UnicodeEncoding();Di2015NewLine        byte[] DataToDecrypt = StringToByteArray(cipherText);Di2015NewLine        bool DoOAEPPadding = false;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] decryptedData;Di2015NewLine            using (RSACryptoServiceProvider RSA = new RSACryptoServiceProvider())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                KeyInfo keyInfo = new KeyInfo();Di2015NewLine                RSAParameters RSAKeyInfo = keyInfo.getKey();Di2015NewLine                RSA.ImportParameters(RSAKeyInfo); Di2015NewLine                decryptedData = RSA.Decrypt(DataToDecrypt, DoOAEPPadding);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            byte[] paddedOutput = paddWithZeros(decryptedData); //to sync with as3cryptoDi2015NewLine            return (ByteConverter.GetString(paddedOutput));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }catch (CryptographicException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //handle errorDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6145822Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void SolveAndDraw(int number)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create array with two dimensions of size numberDi2015NewLine            int[,] matrix = new int[number,number];            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            char direction = 'r';Di2015NewLine            int xPos = 0, yPos = 0;Di2015NewLine            int rightLimit = number - 1;Di2015NewLine            int leftLimit = 0;Di2015NewLine            int upLimit = 0;Di2015NewLine            int bottomLimit = number - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i <= number * number; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                matrix[xPos,yPos] = i;Di2015NewLine                switch (direction)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case 'r':Di2015NewLine                        if (xPos < rightLimit)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ++xPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            direction = 'd';Di2015NewLine                            ++upLimit;Di2015NewLine                            ++yPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case 'l':Di2015NewLine                        if (xPos > leftLimit)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            --xPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            direction = 'u';Di2015NewLine                            --bottomLimit;Di2015NewLine                            --yPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case 'u':Di2015NewLine                        if (yPos > upLimit)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            --yPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            direction = 'r';Di2015NewLine                            ++leftLimit;Di2015NewLine                            ++xPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case 'd':Di2015NewLine                        if (yPos < bottomLimit)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ++yPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            direction = 'l';Di2015NewLine                            --rightLimit;Di2015NewLine                            --xPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now, just dump the matrix contents to stdoutDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < number; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < number; ++j)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Write("{0}\\t", matrix[i,j]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6146890Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ScraperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IEnumerable<string> _sites;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConcurrentBag<string> _data;Di2015NewLine    private volatile int _count;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _total;Di2015NewLine    public Scraper(IEnumerable<string> sites)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sites = sites;Di2015NewLine        _data = new ConcurrentBag<string>();Di2015NewLine        _total = sites.Count();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var site in _sites)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ScrapeSite(site);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ScrapeSite(string site)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var req = WebRequest.Create(site);Di2015NewLine        req.BeginGetResponse(AsyncCallback, req);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AsyncCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Increment(ref _count);Di2015NewLine        var req = ar.AsyncState as WebRequest;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = req.EndGetResponse(ar);Di2015NewLine        var reader = new StreamReader(result.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine        var data = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        this.OnSiteScraped(req.RequestUri.AbsoluteUri, data);Di2015NewLine        _data.Add(data);Di2015NewLine        if (_count == _total)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OnScrapingComplete();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnSiteScraped(string site, string data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = this.SiteScraped;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler(this, new SiteScrapedEventArgs(site, data));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnScrapingComplete()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = this.ScrapingComplete;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler(this, new ScrapingCompletedEventArgs(_data));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<SiteScrapedEventArgs> SiteScraped;Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<ScrapingCompletedEventArgs> ScrapingComplete;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SiteScrapedEventArgs : 6146890Di2015UniqueSeparator public class RankedPageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Rank { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Site { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class WebRequestDataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public WebRequest WebRequest { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public RankedPage Page { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ScraperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IEnumerable<RankedPage> _sites;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Scraper(IEnumerable<RankedPage> sites)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _sites = sites;Di2015NewLine            _data = new ConcurrentBag<KeyValuePair<RankedPage, string>>();Di2015NewLine            _total = sites.Count();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var site in _sites)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ScrapeSite(site);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ScrapeSite(RankedPage site)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var req = WebRequest.Create(site.Site);Di2015NewLine            req.BeginGetResponse(AsyncCallback, new WebRequestData{ Page = site, WebRequest = req});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void AsyncCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Interlocked.Increment(ref _count);Di2015NewLine            var webRequestData = ar.AsyncState as WebRequestData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var req = webRequestData.WebRequest;Di2015NewLine            var result = req.EndGetResponse(ar);Di2015NewLine            var reader = new StreamReader(result.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine            var data = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            this.OnSiteScraped(webRequestData.Page, data);Di2015NewLine            _data.Add(new KeyValuePair<RankedPage, string>(webRequestData.Page,data));Di2015NewLine            if (_count == _total)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OnScrapingComplete();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnSiteScraped(RankedPage page, string data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var handler = this.SiteScraped;Di2015NewLine            if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                handler(this, new SiteScrapedEventArgs(page, data));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnScrapingComplete()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var handler = this.ScrapingComplete;Di2015NewLine            if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                handler(this, new ScrapingCompletedEventArgs(_data));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<SiteScrapedEventArgs> SiteScraped;Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<ScrapingCompletedEventArgs> ScrapingComplete;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SiteScrapedEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public RankedPage Site { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Data { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public SiteScrapedEventArgs(RankedPage site, string data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Site = site;Di2015NewLine            this.Data = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ScrapingCompletedEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 6149138Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult MyAction()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var container = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Request.Cookies["myCookie"] != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         // browser has passed in "myCookie".Di2015NewLine         // use this to create the "sessionKey" cookie to send.Di2015NewLine         var cookie = new System.Net.Cookie("sessionKey",Di2015NewLine             Request.Cookies["myCookie"].Value, "/", "external-site.com");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         container.Add(cookie);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request;Di2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // initialize the request.Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // make sure we're using our cookie container.Di2015NewLine    request.CookieContainer = container;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // execute the request and get the response.Di2015NewLine    response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // send a cookie, "myCookie", to the browser.Di2015NewLine    // it will contain the value of the "sessionKey" cookie.Di2015NewLine    Response.Cookies["myCookie"].Value = response.Cookies["sessionKey"].Value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6151047Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<!(?<!\\\\)(?:\\\\\\\\)*\\\\)\\p{Ll}+Di2015NewLine
6151047Di2015UniqueSeparatorMatchEvaluator
6151047Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring resultString = null;Di2015NewLineresultString = Regex.Replace(subjectString, Di2015NewLine    @"(?<!                 # Negative lookbehind:Di2015NewLine       (?<!\\\\)(?:\\\\\\\\)*\\\\  # Is there no odd number of backslashesDi2015NewLine      |                    # norDi2015NewLine       \\(\\?<?\\p{L}*        # (?<tags or (?modifiersDi2015NewLine      )                    # before the current position?Di2015NewLine      \\p{Ll}+              # Then match one or more letters", Di2015NewLine    new MatchEvaluator(ComputeReplacement), RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic String ComputeReplacement(Match m) {Di2015NewLine    // You can vary the replacement text for each match on-the-flyDi2015NewLine    return @"\\0".ToUpper();  // or whatever is needed for uppercasing in .NETDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6151047Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<!        # assert that the string before the current position doesn't match:Di2015NewLine (?<!\\\\)    # assert that we start at the first backslash in the seriesDi2015NewLine (?:\\\\\\\\)*  # match an even number of backslashesDi2015NewLine \\\\         # match one backslashDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine\\p{Ll}+     # now match any sequence of lowercase lettersDi2015NewLine

6151307Di2015UniqueSeparator// count itDi2015NewLineCountFiles(dest, di, @"*.xls");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void CountFiles(TextWriter writer, DirectoryInfo directory, string searchPattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var counter = new FileGroupCounterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { 5,    Multiplier.K },Di2015NewLine        { 10,   Multiplier.K },Di2015NewLine        { 20,   Multiplier.K },Di2015NewLine        { 100,  Multiplier.K },Di2015NewLine        { 1000, Multiplier.K },Di2015NewLine        { 5,    Multiplier.M },Di2015NewLine        { 10,   Multiplier.M },Di2015NewLine        { 20,   Multiplier.M },Di2015NewLine        { 50,   Multiplier.M },Di2015NewLine        { 100,  Multiplier.M },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var file in directory.EnumerateFiles(searchPattern, SearchOption.AllDirectories))Di2015NewLine                         // or use GetFiles() if you're not targeting .NET 4.0Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        counter.CountFile(file);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var result in counter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine("Excel File " + result);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(result.Count);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// and the supporting classesDi2015NewLinepublic enum Multiplier : longDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    K = 1 << 10,Di2015NewLine    M = 1 << 20,Di2015NewLine    G = 1 << 30,Di2015NewLine    T = 1 << 40,Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FileGroupCounter : IEnumerable<FileGroupCounter.Result>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyCollection<long> Limits { get { return roLimits; } }Di2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyCollection<int> Counts { get { return roCounts; } }Di2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyCollection<Multiplier> Multipliers { get { return roMultipliers; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FileGroupCounter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        limits = new List<long>();Di2015NewLine        counts = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        multipliers = new List<Multiplier>();Di2015NewLine        roLimits= limits.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine        roCounts= counts.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine        roMultipliers= multipliers.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<long> limits;Di2015NewLine    private List<int> counts;Di2015NewLine    private List<Multiplier> multipliers;Di2015NewLine    private ReadOnlyCollection<long> roLimits;Di2015NewLine    private ReadOnlyCollection<int> roCounts;Di2015NewLine    private ReadOnlyCollection<Multiplier> roMultipliers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private long CalculateLength(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return limits[index] * (long)multipliers[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(long limit, Multiplier multiplier)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lastIndex = limits.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine        if (lastIndex >= 0 && limit * (long)multiplier <= CalculateLength(lastIndex))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("limit, multiplier", "must be added in increasing order");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        limits.Add(limit);Di2015NewLine        counts.Add(0);Di2015NewLine        multipliers.Add(multiplier);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CountFile(FileInfo file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (file == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("file");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < limits.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (file.Length <= CalculateLength(i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                counts[i]++;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<Result> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < limits.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (counts[i] > 0)Di2015NewLine                yield return new Result(this, i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public long Limit { get { return counter.limits[index]; } }Di2015NewLine        public int Count { get { return counter.counts[index]; } }Di2015NewLine        public Multiplier Multiplier { get { return counter.multipliers[index]; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Result(FileGroupCounter counter, int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.counter = counter;Di2015NewLine            this.index = index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private FileGroupCounter counter;Di2015NewLine        private int index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index > 0)Di2015NewLine                return String.Format("> {0} {1}B and <= {2} {3}B",Di2015NewLine                    counter.limits[index - 1], counter.multipliers[index - 1],Di2015NewLine                    counter.limits[index], counter.multipliers[index]);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return String.Format("<= {0} {1}B",Di2015NewLine                    counter.limits[index], counter.multipliers[index]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6152044Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <iostream>Di2015NewLine#include <fstream>Di2015NewLine#include <algorithm>Di2015NewLine#include <numeric>Di2015NewLine#include <iostream>Di2015NewLine#include <sstream>Di2015NewLine#include <string>Di2015NewLine#include <vector>Di2015NewLine#include <queue>Di2015NewLine#include <deque>Di2015NewLine#include <set>Di2015NewLine#include <map>Di2015NewLine#include <cstdio>Di2015NewLine#include <cstdlib>Di2015NewLine#include <cctype>Di2015NewLine#include <cassert>Di2015NewLine#include <cmath>Di2015NewLine#include <complex>Di2015NewLine#include <stack>Di2015NewLine#include "time.h"Di2015NewLineusing namespace std;Di2015NewLinetemplate <typename T> string tostr(const T& t) { ostringstream os; os<<t; return os.str(); } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevector< pair< int, int > > ranges;Di2015NewLinestring cur;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid go(int at) {Di2015NewLine  if (at == (int)ranges.size()) {Di2015NewLine    // we're at the end of the ranges vector, print the numberDi2015NewLine    cout<<cur<<endl;Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  for(int i = ranges[at].first; i <= ranges[at].second; ++i) {Di2015NewLine    // add the digit for this range to the stringDi2015NewLine    cur += tostr(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // recursive callDi2015NewLine    go(at+1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // erase the last digit we added (this is where the backtracking part comes in)Di2015NewLine    cur.erase(cur.end()-1);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint main() {Di2015NewLine  ranges.push_back(make_pair(1,3));Di2015NewLine  ranges.push_back(make_pair(0,9));Di2015NewLine  ranges.push_back(make_pair(4,4));Di2015NewLine  ranges.push_back(make_pair(2,3));Di2015NewLine  cur = "";Di2015NewLine  go(0);Di2015NewLine  return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6154402Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BasicIntegerValidator : ValidationRule {       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string PropertyNameToDisplay { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Nullable { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool AllowNegative { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string PropertyNameHelper { get { return PropertyNameToDisplay == null ? string.Empty : " for " + PropertyNameToDisplay; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override ValidationResult Validate(object value, System.Globalization.CultureInfo cultureInfo) {Di2015NewLine        string textEntered = (string)value;Di2015NewLine        int intOutput;Di2015NewLine        double junkd;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(textEntered))Di2015NewLine            return Nullable ? new ValidationResult(true, null) : new ValidationResult(false, getMsgDisplay("Please enter a value"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Int32.TryParse(textEntered, out intOutput))Di2015NewLine            if (Double.TryParse(textEntered, out junkd))Di2015NewLine                return new ValidationResult(false, getMsgDisplay("Please enter a whole number (no decimals)"));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return new ValidationResult(false, getMsgDisplay("Please enter a whole number"));Di2015NewLine        else if (intOutput < 0 && !AllowNegative)Di2015NewLine            return new ValidationResult(false, getNegativeNumberError());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ValidationResult(true, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string getNegativeNumberError() {Di2015NewLine        return PropertyNameToDisplay == null ? "This property must be a positive, whole number" : PropertyNameToDisplay + " must be a positive, whole number";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string getMsgDisplay(string messageBase) {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("{0}{1}", messageBase, PropertyNameHelper);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6154657Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IKeyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type GetKeyType();Di2015NewLine    V GetValue<V>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Key<T, V> : IKeyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public V ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Key(V id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ID = id;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type GetKeyType()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tp GetValue<Tp>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Tp)(object)ID;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Triple<T, V, Z>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T First { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public V Second { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Z Third { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Triple(T first, V second, Z third)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        First = first;Di2015NewLine        Second = second;Di2015NewLine        Third = third;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6154657Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static class Factory<C> where C : IBaseClass, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static object initialData;Di2015NewLine        private static Dictionary<IKey, Triple<EventHandlerTypes, int, WeakReference>> handlers = new Dictionary<IKey, Triple<EventHandlerTypes, int, WeakReference>>();Di2015NewLine        private static Dictionary<IKey, object> data = new Dictionary<IKey, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Factory()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            C newClass = new C();Di2015NewLine            newClass.RegisterSharedData(registerSharedData);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Init<IT>(IT initData)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            initialData = initData;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Dt[] GetData<Dt>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dataList = from d in data where d.Key.GetKeyType() == typeof(Dt) select d.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return dataList.Cast<Dt>().ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void registerSharedData(IKey key, object value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static C Create(int? group)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            C newClass = new C();Di2015NewLine            newClass.RegisterSharedHandlers(group, registerSharedHandlers);Di2015NewLine            // this is a bit bad here since it will call it on all instancesDi2015NewLine            // it would be better if you can call this from outside after creating all the classesDi2015NewLine            Factory<C>.Call(EventHandlerTypes.SetInitialData, null, initialData);Di2015NewLine            return newClass;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void registerSharedHandlers(IKey subscriber, int? group, EventHandlerTypes type, Action<object, SharedEventArgs> handler)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handlers.Add(subscriber, new Triple<EventHandlerTypes, int, WeakReference>(type, group ?? -1, new WeakReference(handler)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Call<N>(EventHandlerTypes type, int? group, N data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Call<N>(null, type, group, data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Call<N>(object sender, EventHandlerTypes type, int? group, N data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (handlers)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var invalid = from h in handlers where h.Value.Third.Target == null select h.Key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // delete expired referencesDi2015NewLine                foreach (var inv in invalid.ToList()) handlers.Remove(inv);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var events = from h in handlers where h.Value.First == type && (!@group.HasValue || h.Value.Second == (int)@group) select h.Value.Third;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var ev in events.ToList())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // call the handlerDi2015NewLine                    ((Action<object, SharedEventArgs>)ev.Target)(sender, arg);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

exitDi2015NewLine      if (GamePad.GetState(PlayerIndex.One).Buttons.Back == ButtonState.Pressed)Di2015NewLine        this.Exit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      float elapsedTime = (float)gameTime.ElapsedGameTime.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      _angle += 0.5f * elapsedTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (Mouse.GetState().LeftButton == ButtonState.Pressed)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        _angle = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (Keyboard.GetState().IsKeyDown(Keys.Left)) Di2015NewLine elapsedTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      base.Update(gameTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is called when the game should draw itself.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="gameTime">Provides a snapshot of timing values.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      GraphicsDevice.Clear(Color.CornflowerBlue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Setup the sprite batch matrix      Di2015NewLine      // Notice that we first translate to the point or rotationDi2015NewLine      // then rotate and when we translate to the desired position weDi2015NewLine      // need to compensate for the first translation so that the textureDi2015NewLine      // appears at the correct locationDi2015NewLine      Matrix m = Di2015NewLine        Matrix.CreateScale(1.5f) Di2015NewLine        * Matrix.CreateTranslation(-_rotationPoint.X, -_rotationPoint.Y, 0) Di2015NewLine        * Matrix.CreateRotationZ(_angle) Di2015NewLine        * Matrix.CreateTranslation(_position.X + _rotationPoint.X, _position.Y + _rotationPoint.Y, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Begin the SpriteBatch passing the matrixDi2015NewLine      spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Deferred, null, null, null, null, null, m);Di2015NewLine      _image1.Draw(spriteBatch);Di2015NewLine      _image2.Draw(spriteBatch);            Di2015NewLine      spriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      base.Draw(gameTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class MyImageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Vector2 _drawOffset;Di2015NewLine      Vector2 _sourcePoint;Di2015NewLine 6158262Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class UnitConversionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string[] lstFootUnits = new string[] {"foots", "foot", "feets", "feet", "ft", "f", "\\""};Di2015NewLine    public static string sFootUnit = "ft";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string[] lstInchUnits = new string[] { "inches", "inchs", "inch", "in", "i", "\\'" };Di2015NewLine    public static string sInchUnit = "in";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string[] lstPoundUnits = new string[] { "pounds", "pound", "pnds", "pnd", "lbs", "lb", "l", "p" };Di2015NewLine    public static string sPoundUnit = "lbs";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string[] lstOunceUnits = new string[] { "ounces", "ounce", "ozs", "oz", "o" };Di2015NewLine    public static string sOunceUnit = "oz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string[] lstCentimeterUnits = new string[] { "centimeters", "centimeter", "centimetres", "centimetre", "cms", "cm", "c"};Di2015NewLine    public static string sCentimeterUnit = "cm";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string[] lstKilogramUnits = new string[] { "kilograms", "kilogram", "kilos", "kilo", "kgs", "kg", "k" };Di2015NewLine    public static string sKilogramsUnit = "kgs";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Attempt to convert between feet/inches and cmDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sHeight"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string ConvertHeight(string sHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(sHeight))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sHeight = UnitConversion.CleanHeight(sHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sHeight.Contains(UnitConversion.sFootUnit))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sHeight = sHeight.Replace(UnitConversion.sFootUnit, "|");Di2015NewLine                sHeight = sHeight.Replace(UnitConversion.sInchUnit, "|");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] sParts = sHeight.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double? dFeet = null;Di2015NewLine                double? dInches = null;Di2015NewLine                double dFeetParsed;Di2015NewLine                double dInchesParsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (sParts.Length >= 2 && double.TryParse(sParts[0].Trim(), out dFeetParsed))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dFeet = dFeetParsed;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (sParts.Length >= 4 && double.TryParse(sParts[2].Trim(), out dInchesParsed))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dInches = dInchesParsed;Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sHeight = UnitConversion.FtToCm(UnitConversion.CalculateFt(dFeet ?? 0, dInches ?? 0)).ToString() + " " + UnitConversion.sCentimeterUnit;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (sHeight.Contains(UnitConversion.sCentimeterUnit))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sHeight = sHeight.Replace(UnitConversion.sCentimeterUnit, "|");Di2015NewLine                string[] sParts = sHeight.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double? dCentimeters = null;Di2015NewLine                double dCentimetersParsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (sParts.Length >= 2 && double.TryParse(sParts[0].Trim(), out dCentimetersParsed))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dCentimeters = dCentimetersParsed;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int? iFeet;Di2015NewLine                int? iInches;Di2015NewLine                if (UnitConversion.CmToFt(dCentimeters, out iFeet, out iInches))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sHeight = (iFeet != null) ? iFeet.ToString() + " " + UnitConversion.sFootUnit : "";Di2015NewLine                    sHeight += (iInches != null) ? " " + iInches.ToString() + " " + UnitConversion.sInchUnit : "";Di2015NewLine                    sHeight = sHeight.Trim();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sHeight = "";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sHeight = "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sHeight = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sHeight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Attempt to convert between Kgs and LbsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sWeight"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string ConvertWeight(string sWeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(sWeight))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sWeight = UnitConversion.CleanWeight(sWeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sWeight.Contains(UnitConversion.sKilogramsUnit))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sWeight = sWeight.Replace(UnitConversion.sKilogramsUnit, "|");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] sParts = sWeight.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double? dKilograms = null;Di2015NewLine                double dKilogramsParsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (sParts.Length >= 2 && double.TryParse(sParts[0].Trim(), out dKilogramsParsed))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dKilograms = dKilogramsParsed;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sWeight = UnitConversion.KgToLbs(dKilograms).ToString("#.###") + " " + UnitConversion.sPoundUnit;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (sWeight.Contains(UnitConversion.sPoundUnit))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sWeight = sWeight.Replace(UnitConversion.sPoundUnit, "|");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] sParts = sWeight.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double? dPounds = null;Di2015NewLine                double dPoundsParsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (sParts.Length >= 2 && double.TryParse(sParts[0].Trim(), out dPoundsParsed))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dPounds = dPoundsParsed;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sWeight = UnitConversion.LbsToKg(dPounds).ToString("#.###") + " " + UnitConversion.sKilogramsUnit;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sWeight = "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sWeight = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sWeight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double? CalculateFt(double dFt, double dInch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double? dFeet = null;Di2015NewLine        if (dFt >= 0 && dInch >= 0 && dInch <= 12)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dFeet = dFt + (dInch / 12);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dFeet;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double KgToLbs(double? dKg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dKg == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dKg.Value * 2.20462262;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double LbsToKg(double? dLbs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dLbs == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dLbs.Value / 2.20462262;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double FtToCm(double? dFt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dFt == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dFt.Value * 30.48;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool CmToFt(double? dCm, out int? iFt, out int? iInch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (dCm == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            iFt = null;Di2015NewLine            iInch = null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double dCalcFeet = dCm.Value / 30.48;Di2015NewLine        double dCalcInches = dCalcFeet - Math.Floor(dCalcFeet);Di2015NewLine        dCalcFeet = Math.Floor(dCalcFeet);Di2015NewLine        dCalcInches = dCalcInches * 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        iFt = (int)dCalcFeet;Di2015NewLine        iInch = (int)dCalcInches;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string CleanUnit(string sOriginal, string[] lstReplaceUnits, string sReplaceWithUnit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Text.StringBuilder sbPattern = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string sReplace in lstReplaceUnits)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sbPattern.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sbPattern.Append("|");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sbPattern.Append(sReplace);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sbPattern.Insert(0,@"(^|\\s)(");Di2015NewLine        sbPattern.Append(@")(\\s|$)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex rReplace = new System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(sbPattern.ToString(), System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sOriginal = rReplace.Replace(sOriginal, sReplaceWithUnit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*foreach (string sReplace in lstReplaceUnits)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sOriginal = sOriginal.Replace(sReplace, " " + sReplaceWithUnit);Di2015NewLine        }*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sOriginal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool StringHasNumbers(string sText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex rxNumbers = new System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex("[0-9]+");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return rxNumbers.IsMatch(sText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string ReduceSpaces(string sText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (sText.Contains("  "))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sText = sText.Replace("  ", " ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string SeperateNumbers(string sText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool bNumber = false;Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(sText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int iChar = 0; iChar < sText.Length; iChar++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool bIsNumber = (sText[iChar] >= '0' && sText[iChar] <= '9') || Di2015NewLine                    (sText[iChar] == '.' && iChar < sText.Length - 1 && sText[iChar + 1] >= '0' && sText[iChar + 1] <= '9');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (iChar > 0 && bIsNumber != bNumber)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sText = sText.Insert(iChar, " ");Di2015NewLine                    iChar++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bNumber = bIsNumber;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string CleanHeight(string sHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (UnitConversion.StringHasNumbers(sHeight))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sHeight = SeperateNumbers(sHeight);Di2015NewLine            sHeight = CleanUnit(sHeight, UnitConversion.lstFootUnits, UnitConversion.sFootUnit);Di2015NewLine            sHeight = CleanUnit(sHeight, UnitConversion.lstInchUnits, UnitConversion.sInchUnit);Di2015NewLine            sHeight = CleanUnit(sHeight, UnitConversion.lstCentimeterUnits, UnitConversion.sCentimeterUnit);Di2015NewLine            sHeight = SeperateNumbers(sHeight);Di2015NewLine            sHeight = ReduceSpaces(sHeight);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sHeight = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sHeight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string CleanWeight(string sWeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (UnitConversion.StringHasNumbers(sWeight))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sWeight = SeperateNumbers(sWeight);Di2015NewLine            sWeight = CleanUnit(sWeight, UnitConversion.lstOunceUnits, UnitConversion.sOunceUnit);Di2015NewLine            sWeight = CleanUnit(sWeight, UnitConversion.lstPoundUnits, UnitConversion.sPoundUnit);Di2015NewLine            sWeight = CleanUnit(sWeight, UnitConversion.lstKilogramUnits, UnitConversion.sKilogramsUnit);Di2015NewLine            sWeight = SeperateNumbers(sWeight);Di2015NewLine            sWeight = ReduceSpaces(sWeight);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sWeight = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sWeight;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6159892Di2015UniqueSeparator    private int GetDirectxMajorVersion()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int directxMajorVersion = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var OSVersion = Environment.OSVersion;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if Windows Vista or laterDi2015NewLine        if (OSVersion.Version.Major >= 6)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if Windows 7 or laterDi2015NewLine            if (OSVersion.Version.Major > 6 || OSVersion.Version.Minor >= 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                directxMajorVersion = 11;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // if Windows VistaDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                directxMajorVersion = 10;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // if Windows XP or earlier.Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (RegistryKey key = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\DirectX"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string versionStr = key.GetValue("Version") as string;Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(versionStr))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var versionComponents = versionStr.Split('.');Di2015NewLine                    if (versionComponents.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int directXLevel;Di2015NewLine                        if (int.TryParse(versionComponents[1], out directXLevel))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            directxMajorVersion = directXLevel;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return directxMajorVersion;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6161788Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void RunSnippet()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var r = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    Replace("asd_asd_asd_".ToCharArray(), 0, r);Di2015NewLine    foreach(var s in r) { Console.WriteLine(s); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static char[] possibilities = new char[] { 'A', 'B', 'C' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Replace(char[] chars, int startIndex, IList<string> result)Di2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine    for (int i = startIndex; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (chars[i] != '_')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we found first '_'Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < possibilities.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            chars[i] = possibilities[j];Di2015NewLine            Replace(chars, i + 1, result);              Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        chars[i] = '_'; // take back what we replacedDi2015NewLine        return; //we're done hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we didn't find any '_', so all were replaced and we have result:Di2015NewLine    result.Add(new string(chars));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6165025Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UseIPDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string IP { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UseIP(string IP)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.IP = IP;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpWebRequest CreateWebRequest(Uri uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ServicePoint servicePoint = ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint(uri);Di2015NewLine        servicePoint.BindIPEndPointDelegate = (servicePoint, remoteEndPoint, retryCount) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IPAddress address = IPAddress.Parse(this.IP);Di2015NewLine            return new IPEndPoint(address, 0);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Will cause bind to be called periodicallyDi2015NewLine        servicePoint.ConnectionLeaseTimeout = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest req = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine        //will cause bind to be called for each request (as long as the consumer of the request doesn't set it back to true!Di2015NewLine        req.KeepAlive = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return req;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6165641Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    Random rng = new Random();  Di2015NewLine    int n = list.Count;  Di2015NewLine    while (n > 1) Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        n--;  Di2015NewLine        int k = rng.Next(n + 1);  Di2015NewLine        T value = list[k];  Di2015NewLine        list[k] = list[n];  Di2015NewLine        list[n] = value;  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6168310Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode
6168310Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<TKey, TValue>
6168310Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode
6168310Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class EquatableDictionary<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine    : IDictionary<TKey, TValue>, IEquatable<ComparableDictionary<TKey, TValue>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<TKey, TValue> dictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(other as ComparableDictionary<TKey, TValue>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(ComparableDictionary<TKey, TValue> other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(other, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (Count != other.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var pair in this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var otherValue;Di2015NewLine            if (!other.TryGetValue(pair.Key, out otherValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!EqualityComparer<TValue>.Default.Equals(pair.Value,Di2015NewLine                                                         otherValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var pair in this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int miniHash = 17;Di2015NewLine            miniHash = miniHash * 31 + Di2015NewLine                   EqualityComparer<TKey>.Default.GetHashCode(pair.Key);Di2015NewLine            miniHash = miniHash * 31 + Di2015NewLine                   EqualityComparer<Value>.Default.GetHashCode(pair.Value);Di2015NewLine            hash ^= miniHash;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Implementation of IDictionary<,> which just delegates to the dictionaryDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6170301Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Base3HandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static int[] idx = {1, 3, 9, 27, 81, 243, 729, 729*3, 729*9, 729*81};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte ReadBase3Bit(short n, byte position)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((position > 8) || (position < 0))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Out of range...");Di2015NewLine        return (byte)((n%idx[position + 1])/idx[position]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static short WriteBase3Bit(short n, byte position, byte newBit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte oldBit = ReadBase3Bit(n, position);Di2015NewLine        return (short) (n + (newBit - oldBit)*idx[position]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
