6171145Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image Resize(this Image image, Single scale)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (image == null)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  scale = Math.Max(0.0F, scale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Int32 scaledWidth = Convert.ToInt32(image.Width * scale);Di2015NewLine  Int32 scaledHeight = Convert.ToInt32(image.Height * scale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return image.Resize(new Size(scaledWidth, scaledHeight));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Image Resize(this Image image, Size size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (image == null || size.IsEmpty)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var resizedImage = new Bitmap(size.Width, size.Height, image.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine  resizedImage.SetResolution(image.HorizontalResolution, image.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using (var g = Graphics.FromImage(resizedImage))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var location = new Point(0, 0);Di2015NewLine    g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine    g.DrawImage(image, new Rectangle(location, size), new Rectangle(location, image.Size), GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return resizedImage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6171145Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image Compress(this Image image, Int32 quality)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (image == null)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  quality = Math.Max(0, Math.Min(100, quality));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using (var encoderParameters = new EncoderParameters(1))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var imageCodecInfo = ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders().First(encoder => String.Compare(encoder.MimeType, "image/jpeg", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == 0);Di2015NewLine    var memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    encoderParameters.Param[0] = new EncoderParameter(Encoder.Quality, Convert.ToInt64(quality));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    image.Save(memoryStream, imageCodecInfo, encoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Image.FromStream(memoryStream);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6171459Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Char[] ReplacementChars = new[] { '', '', '', '', '' };Di2015NewLineprivate static readonly Dictionary<Char, Char> ReplacementMappings = new Dictionary<Char, Char>Di2015NewLine                                                               {Di2015NewLine                                                                 { '', 'a'},Di2015NewLine                                                                 { '', 'e'},Di2015NewLine                                                                 { '', 'i'},Di2015NewLine                                                                 { '', 'u'},Di2015NewLine                                                                 { '', '&'}Di2015NewLine                                                               };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string Translate(String source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine  var currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine  var result = new StringBuilder(source.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while ((currentIndex = source.IndexOfAny(ReplacementChars, startIndex)) != -1)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    result.Append(source.Substring(startIndex, currentIndex - startIndex));Di2015NewLine    result.Append(ReplacementMappings[source[currentIndex]]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    startIndex = currentIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (startIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine    return source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  result.Append(source.Substring(startIndex));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6173131Di2015UniqueSeparatorOpCodes.Box, typeof(int)
6173131Di2015UniqueSeparatorparams object[]
6173131Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly Func<DataContext, Type, int, object> identityLookup = BuildIdentityLookup();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Func<DataContext, Type, int, object> BuildIdentityLookup()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var quickFind = new DynamicMethod("QuickFind", typeof(object), new Type[] { typeof(DataContext), typeof(Type), typeof(int) }, typeof(DataContext), true);Di2015NewLine    var il = quickFind.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const BindingFlags AllInstance = BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public;Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // DBDi2015NewLine    var services = typeof(DataContext).GetField("services", AllInstance);Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, services); // servicesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var identifier = services.FieldType.GetProperty("IdentityManager", AllInstance);Di2015NewLine    il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, identifier.GetGetMethod(true), null); // identifierDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // identifier DBDi2015NewLine    var mapping = typeof(DataContext).GetProperty("Mapping");Di2015NewLine    il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, mapping.GetGetMethod(), null); // identifier mappingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); // identifier mapping typeDi2015NewLine    il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, mapping.PropertyType.GetMethod("GetMetaType"), null); // identifier metatypeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_1); // identifier metatype 1Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Newarr, typeof(object)); // identifier metatype object[]Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Dup); // identifier metatype object[] object[]Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_0); // identifier metatype object[] object[] 0Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_2); // identifier metatype object[] object[] 0 idDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Box, typeof(int)); // identifier metatype object[] object[] 0 boxed-idDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Stelem_Ref); // identifier metatype object[]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, identifier.PropertyType.GetMethod("Find", AllInstance), null); // objectDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (Func<DataContext, Type, int, object>)quickFind.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<DataContext, Type, int, object>));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6175242Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Button_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    if (textBox1.Text == "" || textBox1.Text == "Prmio em ")Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    int numMatches = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in listBox1.Items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (listBox2.Items.Contains(item))Di2015NewLine            numMatches++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // numMatches will now contain the number of elements in the left Di2015NewLine    // listbox that also exist in the right listboxDi2015NewLine    if (numMatches > 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double premio = Double.Parse(textBox1.Text);Di2015NewLine        double prize = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (numMatches == 5)Di2015NewLine          prize = premio * 1.0;Di2015NewLine        if (numMatches == 4)Di2015NewLine          prize = premio * 0.75;Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine          prize = premio * 0.5;Di2015NewLine        // Use string.Format() instead to get fancier formatting of numbersDi2015NewLine        Messagebox.Show ("Sweet, you got " + numMatches + " out of 5 correct numbers. Your prize is " + prize + "");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Sorry, not enough matches - you win nothing!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6180117Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly object sendSyncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineprivate readonly object receiveSyncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ReceiveCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StateObject state = (StateObject)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    Socket client = state.workSocket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lock (receiveSyncRoot)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = client.EndReceive(ar);Di2015NewLine        // do some workDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Kick off socket to receive async again.Di2015NewLine        client.BeginReceive(state.buffer, 0, StateObject.BufferSize, 0,Di2015NewLine                new AsyncCallback(ReceiveCallback), state);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is commonly called by another threadDi2015NewLinepublic void SendMessage(string cmdName, Object data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (sendSyncRoot)Di2015NewLine        client.Send(arrayofdata, 0, arraylength, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6180309Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Func<T, TResult> AsCached<T, TResult>(this Func<T, TResult> function)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cachedResults = new Dictionary<T, TResult>();Di2015NewLine        return (argument) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TResult result;Di2015NewLine            lock (cachedResults)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!cachedResults.TryGetValue(argument, out result))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = function(argument);Di2015NewLine                    cachedResults.Add(argument, result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<T1, T2, TResult> AsCached<T1, T2, TResult>(this Func<T1, T2, TResult> function)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cachedResults = new Dictionary<Tuple<T1, T2>, TResult>();Di2015NewLine        return (value1, value2) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TResult result;Di2015NewLine            var paramsTuple = new Tuple<T1, T2>(value1, value2);Di2015NewLine            lock(cachedResults)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!cachedResults.TryGetValue(paramsTuple, out result))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = function(value1, value2);Di2015NewLine                    cachedResults.Add(paramsTuple, result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<T1, T2, T3, TResult> AsCached<T1, T2, T3, TResult>(this Func<T1, T2, T3, TResult> function)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cachedResults = new Dictionary<Tuple<T1, T2, T3>, TResult>();Di2015NewLine        return (value1, value2, value3) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TResult result;Di2015NewLine            var paramsTuple = new Tuple<T1, T2, T3>(value1, value2, value3);Di2015NewLine            lock(cachedResults)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!cachedResults.TryGetValue(paramsTuple, out result))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = function(value1, value2, value3);Di2015NewLine                    cachedResults.Add(paramsTuple, result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6180309Di2015UniqueSeparatorAsCached

6180943Di2015UniqueSeparatorx

6180943Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main() {Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Agency, AgencyDTO>> selector1 = x => new AgencyDTO { Name = x.Name };Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Agency, AgencyDTO>> selector2 = x => new AgencyDTO { Phone = x.PhoneNumber };Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Agency, AgencyDTO>> selector3 = x => new AgencyDTO { Location = x.Locality.Name };Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Agency, AgencyDTO>> selector4 = x => new AgencyDTO { EmployeeCount = x.Employees.Count() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // combine the assignments from the 4 selectorsDi2015NewLine    var convert = Combine(selector1, selector2, selector3, selector4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // sample dataDi2015NewLine    var orig = new AgencyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Name = "a",Di2015NewLine        PhoneNumber = "b",Di2015NewLine        Locality = new Location { Name = "c" },Di2015NewLine        Employees = new List<Employee> { new Employee(), new Employee() }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check itDi2015NewLine    var dto = new[] { orig }.AsQueryable().Select(convert).Single();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(dto.Name); // aDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(dto.Phone); // bDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(dto.Location); // cDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(dto.EmployeeCount); // 2Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic Expression<Func<TSource, TDestination>> Combine<TSource, TDestination>(Di2015NewLine    params Expression<Func<TSource, TDestination>>[] selectors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var zeroth = ((MemberInitExpression)selectors[0].Body);Di2015NewLine    var param = selectors[0].Parameters[0];Di2015NewLine    List<MemberBinding> bindings = new List<MemberBinding>(zeroth.Bindings.OfType<MemberAssignment>());Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < selectors.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberInit = (MemberInitExpression)selectors[i].Body;Di2015NewLine        var replace = new ParameterReplaceVisitor(selectors[i].Parameters[0], param);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var binding in memberInit.Bindings.OfType<MemberAssignment>())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bindings.Add(Expression.Bind(binding.Member,Di2015NewLine                replace.VisitAndConvert(binding.Expression, "Combine")));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, TDestination>>(Di2015NewLine        Expression.MemberInit(zeroth.NewExpression, bindings), param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ParameterReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ParameterReplaceVisitor(ParameterExpression from, ParameterExpression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6180943Di2015UniqueSeparatorNewExpression
6180943Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<TSource, TDestination>> Combine<TSource, TDestination>(Di2015NewLine    params Expression<Func<TSource, TDestination>>[] selectors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TSource), "x");Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, TDestination>>(Di2015NewLine        Expression.MemberInit(Di2015NewLine            Expression.New(typeof(TDestination).GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes)),Di2015NewLine            from selector in selectorsDi2015NewLine            let replace = new ParameterReplaceVisitor(Di2015NewLine                  selector.Parameters[0], param)Di2015NewLine            from binding in ((MemberInitExpression)selector.Body).BindingsDi2015NewLine                  .OfType<MemberAssignment>()Di2015NewLine            select Expression.Bind(binding.Member,Di2015NewLine                  replace.VisitAndConvert(binding.Expression, "Combine")))Di2015NewLine        , param);        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6185448Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate System.Drawing.Color CalculateAverageColor(Bitmap bm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int width = bm.Width;Di2015NewLine    int height = bm.Height;Di2015NewLine    int red = 0;Di2015NewLine    int green = 0;Di2015NewLine    int blue = 0;Di2015NewLine    int minDiversion = 15; // drop pixels that do not differ by at least minDiversion between color values (white, gray or black)Di2015NewLine    int dropped = 0; // keep track of dropped pixelsDi2015NewLine    long[] totals = new long[] { 0, 0, 0 };Di2015NewLine    int bppModifier = bm.PixelFormat == System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb ? 3 : 4; // cutting corners, will fail on anything else but 32 and 24 bit imagesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BitmapData srcData = bm.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, bm.Width, bm.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bm.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    int stride = srcData.Stride;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr Scan0 = srcData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unsafeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* p = (byte*)(void*)Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int idx = (y * stride) + x * bppModifier;Di2015NewLine                red = p[idx + 2];Di2015NewLine                green = p[idx + 1];Di2015NewLine                blue = p[idx];Di2015NewLine                if (Math.Abs(red - green) > minDiversion || Math.Abs(red - blue) > minDiversion || Math.Abs(green - blue) > minDiversion)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    totals[2] += red;Di2015NewLine                    totals[1] += green;Di2015NewLine                    totals[0] += blue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dropped++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = width * height - dropped;Di2015NewLine    int avgR = (int)(totals[2] / count);Di2015NewLine    int avgG = (int)(totals[1] / count);Di2015NewLine    int avgB = (int)(totals[0] / count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(avgR, avgG, avgB);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6185448Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (color.G - color.B > 15) { form.Type = FormTypes.GreenForm }Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine            for (int i = ev.Entries.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EventLogEntry CurrentEntry = ev.Entries[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //use DateTime type to compare on CurrentEntry.TimeGeneratedDi2015NewLine                DateTime dt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine                TimeSpan ts = dt.Subtract( CurrentEntry.TimeGenerated);Di2015NewLine                int hours = (ts.Days * 24) + ts.Hours;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (CurrentEntry.Source.ToUpper() == "USER32")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Time Generated:" + CurrentEntry.TimeGenerated);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Hours ago:" + hours);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Event ID : " + CurrentEntry.InstanceId);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Entry Type : " + CurrentEntry.EntryType.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Message :  " + CurrentEntry.Message + "\\n");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ev.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6187153Di2015UniqueSeparator//G = current game.Di2015NewLine//T = total teamsDi2015NewLine//Next round game = (T / 2) + RoundedUp(G / 2)Di2015NewLine//i. e.: G = 2, T = 8Di2015NewLine       //Next round game = (8 / 2) + RoundedUp(2 / 2) = 5Di2015NewLinepublic int NextGame(int totalTeams, int currentGame) {Di2015NewLine    return (totalTeams / 2) + (int)Math.Ceiling((double)currentGame / 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6188440Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override string Execute(CodeActivityContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Obtain the runtime value of the input arguments.Di2015NewLine        string assemblyInfoFileMask = context.GetValue(AssemblyInfoFileMask);Di2015NewLine        IBuildDetail buildDetail = context.GetValue(BuildDetail);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var workspace = buildDetail.BuildDefinition.Workspace;Di2015NewLine        var versionControl = buildDetail.BuildServer.TeamProjectCollection.GetService<VersionControlServer>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Regex regex = new Regex(AttributeKey + VersionRegex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate of the folder mappings in the workspace and find the AssemblyInfo files Di2015NewLine        // that match the mask.Di2015NewLine        foreach (var folder in workspace.Mappings)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string path = Path.Combine(folder.ServerItem, assemblyInfoFileMask);Di2015NewLine            context.TrackBuildMessage(string.Format("Checking for file: {0}", path));Di2015NewLine            ItemSet itemSet = versionControl.GetItems(path, RecursionType.Full);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Item item in itemSet.Items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.TrackBuildMessage(string.Format("Download {0}", item.ServerItem));Di2015NewLine                string localFile = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Download the file and try to extract the version.Di2015NewLine                    item.DownloadFile(localFile);Di2015NewLine                    string text = File.ReadAllText(localFile);Di2015NewLine                    Match match = regex.Match(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string versionNumber = match.Value.Substring(AttributeKey.Length + 2, match.Value.Length - AttributeKey.Length - 4);Di2015NewLine                        Version version = new Version(versionNumber);Di2015NewLine                        Version newVersion = new Version(version.Major, version.Minor, version.Build + 1, version.Revision);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        context.TrackBuildMessage(string.Format("Version found {0}", newVersion));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return newVersion.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    File.Delete(localFile);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

<code>ConfigFile cfg = new ConfigFile()</code> will result in a NotImplemented exceptionDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private ConfigFile()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException("No default constructor for the ConfigFile class");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Public constructorDi2015NewLine        /// <example>ConfigFile cfg = new ConfigFile(@"c:\\MyApp\\MyApp.exe.config");</example>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ConfigFilePath">The path to the configuration file</param>Di2015NewLine        public ConfigFile(string ConfigFilePath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Check to see if the file existsDi2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(ConfigFilePath)){Di2015NewLine                //Initialise the XmlDocument to hold the config fileDi2015NewLine                m_XmlDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine                //Store the path to the config fileDi2015NewLine                m_ConfigFilePath = ConfigFilePath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //FileStream to FileStreamDi2015NewLine                sr = new StreamReader(fIn);Di2015NewLine                //StreamWriter to write to the FileStreamDi2015NewLine                sw = new StreamWriter(fIn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Try and load the XML from the file streamDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_XmlDoc.LoadXml(sr.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine                    m_AppSettingsNode = m_XmlDoc.GetElementsByTagName("appSettings")[0];Di2015NewLine                    m_ConnectionStringsNode = m_XmlDoc.GetElementsByTagName("connectionStrings")[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    loadAppSettings();Di2015NewLine                    loadConnStrings();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //If it went pear shaped, throw the exception upwardsDi2015NewLine                    throw ex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            //If the file doesn't exist, throw a FileNotFound exceptionDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new FileNotFoundException(ConfigFilePath + " does not exist");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void loadAppSettings()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_AppSettings = new OrderedDictionary();Di2015NewLine            XmlNodeList nl = m_AppSettingsNode.SelectNodes("add");Di2015NewLine            foreach (XmlNode node in nl)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_AppSettings.Add(node.Attributes["key"].Value, nl)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_ConnectionStrings.Add(node.Attributes["name"].Value, node.Attributes["connectionString"].Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void setAppSetting(string name, string newValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!m_AppSettings.Contains(name))Di2015NewLine = newValue;Di2015NewLine                fIn.SetLength(0);Di2015NewLine                sw.Write(m_XmlDoc.InnerXml);Di2015NewLine                sw.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #region "Static Methods"Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Static method to return a ConfigFile objectDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private bool IsLiquid(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     return tiles[x, y] > 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private bool IsSolid(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     return tiles[x, y] == 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private bool IsEmpty(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     return IsEmpty(tiles, x, }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void ProcessTiles()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     byte processedValue = 0xFF;Di2015NewLine     byte unprocessedValue = 0xFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     for (int y = 0; y < rows; y ++)Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < cols; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (IsLiquid(x, y))Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              if (processedValue == 0xff)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 unprocessedValue = tiles[x, y];Di2015NewLine                 processedValue = (byte)(5 - tiles[x, y]);Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if (tiles[x, y] == unprocessedValue)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 BlobInfo blob = GetWaterAt(new Point(x, y), unprocessedValue, processedValue, new Rectangle(0, 0, 50, 50));Di2015NewLine                 blob.ProcessMovement(tiles);Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class BlobInfoDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     private int minY;Di2015NewLine     private int maxEscapeY;Di2015NewLine     private List<int> TopXes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine     private List<int> BottomEscapeXes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine     public BlobInfo(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        minY = y;Di2015NewLine        maxEscapeY = -1;Di2015NewLine        TopXes.Add(x);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     public void NoteEscapePoint(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (maxEscapeY < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           maxEscapeY = y;Di2015NewLine           BottomEscapeXes.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (y < maxEscapeY)Di2015NewLine           return;Di2015NewLine        else if (y > maxEscapeY)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           maxEscapeY = y;Di2015NewLine           BottomEscapeXes.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        BottomEscapeXes.Add(x);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     public void NoteLiquidPoint(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (y < minY)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           minY = y;Di2015NewLine           TopXes.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (y > minY)Di2015NewLine           return;Di2015NewLine        TopXes.Add(x);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     public void ProcessMovement(byte[,] tiles)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        int min = TopXes.Count < BottomEscapeXes.Count ? TopXes.Count : BottomEscapeXes.Count;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (IsEmpty(tiles, BottomEscapeXes[i], maxEscapeY) && (maxEscapeY > minY))Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              tiles[BottomEscapeXes[i], maxEscapeY] = tiles[TopXes[i], minY];Di2015NewLine              tiles[TopXes[i], minY] = 0;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private BlobInfo GetWaterAt(Point start, byte unprocessedValue, byte processedValue, Rectangle bounds)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     Stack<Point> toFill = new Stack<Point>();Di2015NewLine     BlobInfo result = new BlobInfo(start.X, start.Y);Di2015NewLine     toFill.Push(start);Di2015NewLine     doDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        Point cur = toFill.Pop();Di2015NewLine        while ((cur.X > bounds.X) && (tiles[cur.X - 1, cur.Y] == unprocessedValue))Di2015NewLine           cur.X--;Di2015NewLine        if ((cur.X > bounds.X) && IsEmpty(cur.X - 1, cur.Y))Di2015NewLine           result.NoteEscapePoint(cur.X - 1, cur.Y);Di2015NewLine        bool pushedAbove = false;Di2015NewLine        bool pushedBelow = false;Di2015NewLine        for (; ((cur.X < bounds.X + bounds.Width) && tiles[cur.X, cur.Y] == unprocessedValue); cur.X++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           result.NoteLiquidPoint(cur.X, cur.Y);Di2015NewLine           tiles[cur.X, cur.Y] = processedValue;Di2015NewLine           if (cur.Y > bounds.Y)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              if (IsEmpty(cur.X, cur.Y - 1))Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 result.NoteEscapePoint(cur.X, cur.Y - 1);Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if ((tiles[cur.X, cur.Y - 1] == unprocessedValue) && !pushedAbove)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 pushedAbove = true;Di2015NewLine                 toFill.Push(new Point(cur.X, cur.Y - 1));Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if (tiles[cur.X, cur.Y - 1] != unprocessedValue)Di2015NewLine                 pushedAbove = false;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           if (cur.Y < bounds.Y + bounds.Height - 1)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              if (IsEmpty(cur.X, cur.Y + 1))Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 result.NoteEscapePoint(cur.X, cur.Y + 1);Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if ((tiles[cur.X, cur.Y + 1] == unprocessedValue) && !pushedBelow)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 pushedBelow = true;Di2015NewLine                 toFill.Push(new Point(cur.X, cur.Y + 1));Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if (tiles[cur.X, cur.Y + 1] != unprocessedValue)Di2015NewLine                 pushedBelow = false;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if ((cur.X < bounds.X + bounds.Width) && (IsEmpty(cur.X, cur.Y)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           result.NoteEscapePoint(cur.X, cur.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     } while (toFill.Count > 0);Di2015NewLine     return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void timer1_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     ProcessTiles();Di2015NewLine     Invalidate();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Form1_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        int x = e.X * cols / ClientSize.Width;Di2015NewLine        int y = e.Y * rows / ClientSize.Height;Di2015NewLine        if ((x >= 0) && (x < cols) && (y >= 0) && (y < rows))Di2015NewLine           tiles[x, y] = 2;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6195325Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly object _syncObject = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Log(string logMessage, TextWriter w)    {Di2015NewLine   // only one thread can own this lock, so other threadsDi2015NewLine   // entering this method will wait here until lock isDi2015NewLine   // available.Di2015NewLine   lock(_syncObject) {Di2015NewLine      w.WriteLine("{0} {1}", DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString(),Di2015NewLine          DateTime.Now.ToLongDateString());Di2015NewLine      w.WriteLine("  :");Di2015NewLine      w.WriteLine("  :{0}", logMessage);Di2015NewLine      w.WriteLine("-------------------------------");Di2015NewLine      // Update the underlying file.Di2015NewLine      w.Flush();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6196558Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool ArraysEqual<T>(T[] a1, T[] a2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(a1,a2))Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (a1 == null || a2 == null)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (a1.Length != a2.Length)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    EqualityComparer<T> comparer = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < a1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!comparer.Equals(a1[i], a2[i])) return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6203927Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The Action callback for the LoadEntityQuery handler. See the Handle method Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private Action<LoadEntityQueryResult> _reply = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Accumulator used to determine when the last entity has been loadedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private int EntityCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Collective error container for Errors from the LoadOperation. This is value is returned viaDi2015NewLine    /// the _reply callback to the calling code.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private List<Exception> Errors = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Handle(LoadEntityQuery loadQuery, Action<LoadEntityQueryResult> reply)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _reply = reply;Di2015NewLine        Errors = new List<Exception>();Di2015NewLine        EntityCount = loadQuery.Entities.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo _loadOpMethod = this.GetType().GetMethod("Load", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        int _entityCount = loadQuery.Entities.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var entry in loadQuery.Entities)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type entityType = entry.Key;Di2015NewLine            Type _contextType = EmployeeJobsContext.Instance.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo _methodInfo = (from x in _contextType.GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                                      where x.ReturnType.BaseType == typeof(EntityQuery)Di2015NewLine                                      from y in x.ReturnType.GetGenericArguments()Di2015NewLine                                      where y == entityTypeDi2015NewLine                                      select x).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            if (_methodInfo != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var query = _methodInfo.Invoke(EmployeeJobsContext.Instance, null);Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo _typedLoadOpMethod = _loadOpMethod.MakeGenericMethod(new Type[] { entityType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _typedLoadOpMethod.Invoke(this, new[] { query, entry.Value});Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Load<T>(EntityQuery<T> query, Expression<Func<T, bool>> where) where T: EntityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (where != null)Di2015NewLine            query = query.Where(where);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EmployeeJobsContext.Instance.Load(query, (loadOp) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EntityCount--;Di2015NewLine                if (loadOp.HasError)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Errors.Add(loadOp.Error);Di2015NewLine                    loadOp.MarkErrorAsHandled();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (EntityCount == 0)Di2015NewLine                    _reply(new LoadEntityQueryResult { ErrorList = Errors });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6206344Di2015UniqueSeparator    static int[,] Combine(params int[][] arrays)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[][] combined = CombineRecursive(arrays).Select(x=>x.ToArray()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        return JaggedToRectangular(combined);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> CombineRecursive(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> arrays)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (arrays.Count() > 1)Di2015NewLine            return from a in arrays.First()Di2015NewLine                   from b in CombineRecursive(arrays.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine                   select Enumerable.Repeat(a, 1).Union(b);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return from a in arrays.First()Di2015NewLine                   select Enumerable.Repeat(a, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int[,] JaggedToRectangular(int[][] combined)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int length = combined.Length;Di2015NewLine        int width = combined.Min(x=>x.Length);Di2015NewLine        int[,] result = new int[length, width];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < length; y++)Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine                result[y, x] = combined[y][x];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6216841Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreate PROC [PE].[DeployChecker]Di2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        @DB     VARCHAR(128)Di2015NewLine    ,   @Proc   VARCHAR(128) Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAS Di2015NewLine    BEGIN Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    --declare variable for dynamic SQLDi2015NewLine    DECLARE Di2015NewLine        @SQL    VARCHAR(512)Di2015NewLine    ,   @x      intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -- remove temp table if it exists as it should not be prepopulated.Di2015NewLine    IF object_ID('tempdb..#Procs') IS NOT NULLDi2015NewLine        DROP TABLE tempdb..#ProcsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -- Create temp table to catch built in sql stored procedureDi2015NewLine    CREATE TABLE #Procs --DECLARE @Procs table Di2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            ServerName      varchar(64)Di2015NewLine        ,   DatabaseName    VARCHAR(128)Di2015NewLine        ,   ObjectName      VARCHAR(256)Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @X = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -- Loops through the linked servers with matching criteria to examine how MANY there are.  Do a while loop while they exist.Di2015NewLine    -- in our case the different servers are merely incrementing numbers so I merely do a while loop, you could be more explicit if needed.Di2015NewLine    WHILE @X <= (SELECT count(*) FROM sys.servers WHERE name LIKE 'PCTRSQL_')Di2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        -- for some reason I can't automate the 'sp_msforeachdb' proc to take dynamic sql but I can set a variable to do it and then run it.Di2015NewLine        SET @SQL = 'Insert Into #Procs Exec PCTRSQL' + CAST(@X AS VARCHAR(2)) + '.MASTER..sp_msforeachdb ' +Di2015NewLine        '''select @@SERVERNAME, ''''?'''', name from [?].sys.procedures (nolock) where ''''?'''' like ''''%' + @DB + '%'''' '''Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Exec (@SQL)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SET @X = @X + 1Di2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLine    ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -- Find distinct Server detail Di2015NewLine    WITH s AS Di2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine        SELECT DistinctDi2015NewLine            ServerNameDi2015NewLine        ,   DatabaseNameDi2015NewLine        FROM #Procs Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine    -- do logic search in the select statement to see if there is a proc like what is searched forDi2015NewLine    , p ASDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine        SELECT Di2015NewLine            ServerNameDi2015NewLine        ,   DatabaseNameDi2015NewLine        ,   CASE WHEN ObjectName LIKE '%' + @Proc + '%' THEN ObjectName END AS ProcNameDi2015NewLine        FROM #ProcsDi2015NewLine        where  ObjectName LIKE '%' + @Proc + '%'Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine    --  now do a left join from the distinct server cte to the lookup for the proc cte, we want to examine ALL the procs that match a criteraDi2015NewLine    --  however if nothing eixsts we wish to show a NULL value of a single row for a reference to the Servername and DatabaseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT Di2015NewLine        s.ServerNameDi2015NewLine    ,   s.DatabaseNameDi2015NewLine    ,   p.ProcNameDi2015NewLine    ,   CAST(CASE WHEN ProcName IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS bit) AS ExistsInDBDi2015NewLine    FROM sDi2015NewLine        LEFT JOIN p ON s.ServerName = p.ServerName Di2015NewLine            AND s.DatabaseName = p.DatabaseNameDi2015NewLine        ORDER BY DatabaseName, ServerName, ProcNameDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

6217716Di2015UniqueSeparator[WebService]Di2015NewLinepublic class AsyncWebService : System.Web.Services.WebServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic delegate string LengthyProcedureAsyncStub(Di2015NewLine    int milliseconds, MyState state);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string LengthyProcedure(int milliseconds, MyState state) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    while(state.Abort == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine          //Do your work.  Check periodically for an abortDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return state.Abort ? "Aborted" : "Success"; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//This state object is what you can use to track invocations of your methodDi2015NewLine//You'll need to store it in a thread safe container.  Add it to the container in the Begin method and remove it in the end method.  While it's in the container other web methods can find it and use it to monitor or stop the executing job.Di2015NewLinepublic class MyState Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    public Guid JobID = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine    public object previousState; Di2015NewLine    public LengthyProcedureAsyncStub asyncStub; Di2015NewLine    public bool Abort = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[ System.Web.Services.WebMethod ]Di2015NewLinepublic IAsyncResult BeginLengthyProcedure(int milliseconds, Di2015NewLine    AsyncCallback cb, object s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LengthyProcedureAsyncStub stub Di2015NewLine        = new LengthyProcedureAsyncStub(LengthyProcedure);Di2015NewLine    MyState ms = new MyState();Di2015NewLine    ms.previousState = s; Di2015NewLine    ms.asyncStub = stub;Di2015NewLine    //Add to service wide containerDi2015NewLine    return stub.BeginInvoke(milliseconds, cb, ms);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[ System.Web.Services.WebMethod ]Di2015NewLinepublic string EndLengthyProcedure(IAsyncResult call)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Remove from service wide containerDi2015NewLine    MyState ms = (MyState)call.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    return ms.asyncStub.EndInvoke(call);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[WebMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void StopJob(Guid jobID)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     //Look for the job in the service wide containerDi2015NewLine     MyState state = GetStateFromServiceWideContainer(jobID);Di2015NewLine     state.Abort = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

     public Bitmap buffer { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Bitmap prevBuffer { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public APNGBox(APNGLib.APNG png)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frameNum = 0;Di2015NewLine            apng = png;Di2015NewLine            buffer = apng.ToBitmap(0);Di2015NewLine            prevBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UpdateUI()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (PictureBox pb in pics)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            APNGBox box = (APNGBox)pb.Tag;Di2015NewLine            APNGLib.APNG png = box.apng;Di2015NewLine            if (!png.IsAnimated)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pb.Image == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pb.Image = png.ToBitmap();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (box.frameNum != png.FrameCount - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Bitmap prev = box.prevBuffer == null ? null : new Bitmap(box.prevBuffer);Di2015NewLine                    APNGLib.Frame f1 = png.GetFrame(box.frameNum);Di2015NewLine                    if (f1.DisposeOp != APNGLib.Frame.DisposeOperation.PREVIOUS)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        box.prevBuffer = new Bitmap(box.buffer);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    DisposeBuffer(box.buffer, new Rectangle((int)f1.XOffset, (int)f1.YOffset, (int)f1.Width, (int)f1.Height), f1.DisposeOp, prev);Di2015NewLine                    box.frameNum++;Di2015NewLine                    APNGLib.Frame f2 = png.GetFrame(box.frameNum);Di2015NewLine                    RenderNextFrame(box.buffer, new Point((int)f2.XOffset, (int)f2.YOffset), png.ToBitmap(box.frameNum), f2.BlendOp);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    box.frameNum = 0;Di2015NewLine                    box.prevBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine                    ClearFrame(box.buffer);Di2015NewLine                    RenderNextFrame(box.buffer, Point.Empty, png.ToBitmap(box.frameNum), APNGLib.Frame.BlendOperation.SOURCE);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                pb.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DisposeBuffer(Bitmap buffer, Rectangle region, APNGLib.Frame.DisposeOperation dispose, Bitmap prevBuffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(buffer))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            g.CompositingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode.SourceCopy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Brush b = new SolidBrush(Color.Transparent);Di2015NewLine            switch (dispose)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case APNGLib.Frame.DisposeOperation.NONE:Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case APNGLib.Frame.DisposeOperation.BACKGROUND:Di2015NewLine                    g.FillRectangle(b, region);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case APNGLib.Frame.DisposeOperation.PREVIOUS:Di2015NewLine                    if(prevBuffer != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        g.FillRectangle(b, region);Di2015NewLine                        g.DrawImage(prevBuffer, region, region, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RenderNextFrame(Bitmap buffer, Point point, Bitmap nextFrame, APNGLib.Frame.BlendOperation blend)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(buffer))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch(blend)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case APNGLib.Frame.BlendOperation.OVER:Di2015NewLine                    g.CompositingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode.SourceOver;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case APNGLib.Frame.BlendOperation.SOURCE:Di2015NewLine                    g.CompositingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode.SourceCopy;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(nextFrame, point);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ClearFrame(Bitmap buffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(buffer))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            g.Clear(Color.Transparent);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6219305Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<IGrouping<int, EbrRecord>> query = ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  orderby Location, RepName, AccountIDDi2015NewLine  select new EbrRecord(Di2015NewLine    AccountID = EbrData[0],Di2015NewLine    AccountName = EbrData[1],Di2015NewLine    MBSegment = EbrData[2],Di2015NewLine    RepName = EbrData[4],Di2015NewLine    Location = EbrData[7],Di2015NewLine    TsrLocation = EbrData[8]) into xDi2015NewLine  group x by new {Location = x.Location, RepName = x.RepName} into gDi2015NewLine  from g2 in g.Select((data, index) => new Record = data, Index = index })Di2015NewLine              .GroupBy(y => y.Index/100, y => y.Record)Di2015NewLine  select g2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<List<EbrRecord>> result = query.Select(g => g.ToList()).ToList();Di2015NewLine

");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SolutionParser solutionParser = new SolutionParser(SolutionPath);Di2015NewLine    SolutionElement solution = solutionParser.GetParsedSolution();Di2015NewLine    if (solution == null)Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Done.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (ProjectElement project in solution.AllProjects)Di2015NewLine      foreach (SourceFile file in project.AllFiles)Di2015NewLine        foreach (TypeDeclaration type in file.AllTypes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Console.Write(type.FullName);Di2015NewLine          Console.WriteLine(", members: " + ((ITypeElement)type).Members.Count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ParserHelper.UnRegisterParserServices();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6220794Di2015UniqueSeparatorColumnGuess
6220794Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ColumnGuessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Type Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Samples { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ImproveType(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Samples > 10) return;Di2015NewLine        this.Samples++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float f; bool b; DateTime d; int i;Di2015NewLine        if (Single.TryParse(value, out f))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Type = typeof(float);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Boolean.TryParse(value, out b))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Type = typeof(bool);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (DateTime.TryParse(value, out d))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Type = typeof(DateTime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (value.Length == 1 && this.Type == null && !Char.IsDigit(value[0]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Type = typeof(char);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (this.Type != typeof(float) && Int32.TryParse(value, out i))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Type = typeof(int);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6220794Di2015UniqueSeparatorTableGuess
6220794Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TableGuessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<string[]> rows = new List<string[]>();Di2015NewLine    private List<ColumnGuess> columns;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddColumns(IEnumerable<string> columns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.columns = columns.Select(cc => new ColumnGuess { Name = cc })Di2015NewLine                              .ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddRow(string[] parts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int ii = 0; ii < parts.Length; ++ii)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(parts[ii])) continue;Di2015NewLine            columns[ii].ImproveType(parts[ii]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.rows.Add(parts);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6220794Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataTable AsDataTable()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dataTable = new dataTable(this.Name);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var column in this.columns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(Di2015NewLine            column.Name,Di2015NewLine            column.Type ?? typeof(string)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var row in this.rows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object[] values = new object[dataTable.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine        for (int cc = 0; cc < row.Length; ++cc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[cc] = Convert.ChangeType(row[cc],Di2015NewLine                dataTable.Columns[cc].DataType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dataTable.LoadRow(values, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dataTable;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6222121Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] CreateZip(byte[] fileBytes, string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    using (var zipStream = new ZipOutputStream(memoryStream))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var crc = new Crc32();Di2015NewLine        crc.Reset();Di2015NewLine        crc.Update(fileBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var zipEntry =Di2015NewLine            new ZipEntry(fileName)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Crc = crc.Value,Di2015NewLine                DateTime = DateTime.Now,Di2015NewLine                Size = fileBytes.LengthDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        zipStream.PutNextEntry(zipEntry);Di2015NewLine        zipStream.Write(fileBytes, 0, fileBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        zipStream.Finish();Di2015NewLine        zipStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        return memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6227315Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void Form_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // append the function to the RichTextBox's TextChanged eventDi2015NewLine        MyRichTextBox.TextChanged += Capitalize_Bold_FirstLine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Capitalize_Bold_FirstLine(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RichTextBox box = sender as RichTextBox;Di2015NewLine        if (box != null && box.Text != "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the current selection text of the textboxDi2015NewLine            int ss = box.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine            int sl = box.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine            // get the position where the first line endsDi2015NewLine            int firstLineEnd = box.Text.IndexOf('\\n');Di2015NewLine            if (firstLineEnd < 0)Di2015NewLine                firstLineEnd = box.Text.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // split the linesDi2015NewLine            string[] lines = box.Text.Split('\\n');Di2015NewLine            // capitalize the first lineDi2015NewLine            lines[0] = lines[0].ToUpper();Di2015NewLine            // join them back and set the new textDi2015NewLine            box.Text = String.Join("\\n", lines);Di2015NewLine            // select the first line and make it boldDi2015NewLine            box.SelectionStart = 0;Di2015NewLine            box.SelectionLength = firstLineEnd;Di2015NewLine            box.SelectionFont = new Font(box.Font, FontStyle.Bold);Di2015NewLine            // select the rest and make it regularDi2015NewLine            box.SelectionStart = firstLineEnd;Di2015NewLine            box.SelectionLength = box.Text.Length - firstLineEnd;Di2015NewLine            box.SelectionFont = new Font(box.Font, FontStyle.Regular);Di2015NewLine            // go back to what the user had selectedDi2015NewLine            box.SelectionStart = ss;Di2015NewLine            box.SelectionLength = sl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6228513Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SortableGenericCollection<T> : BindingList<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  IByColumnComparer GenericComparer = null; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public SortableGenericCollection(IByColumnComparer SortingComparer)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     GenericComparer = SortingComparer;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override bool SupportsSortingCoreDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     getDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override bool IsSortedCoreDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     getDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Items.Count - 1; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           T lhs = Items[i];Di2015NewLine           T rhs = Items[i + 1];Di2015NewLine           PropertyDescriptor property = SortPropertyCore;Di2015NewLine           if (property != null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              object lhsValue = lhs == null ? null :Di2015NewLine              property.GetValue(lhs);Di2015NewLine              object rhsValue = rhs == null ? null :Di2015NewLine              property.GetValue(rhs);Di2015NewLine              int result;Di2015NewLine              if (lhsValue == null)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 result = -1;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              else if (rhsValue == null)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 result = 1;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              elseDi2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 result = GenericComparer.Compare(lhs, rhs); Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              if (result >= 0)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 return false;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private ListSortDirection sortDirection;Di2015NewLine  protected override ListSortDirection SortDirectionCoreDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     getDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        return sortDirection;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private PropertyDescriptor sortProperty;Di2015NewLine  protected override PropertyDescriptor SortPropertyCoreDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     getDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        return sortProperty;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void ApplySortCore(PropertyDescriptor prop,Di2015NewLine  ListSortDirection direction)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     sortProperty = prop;Di2015NewLine     sortDirection = direction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     GenericComparer.SortColumn = prop.Name;Di2015NewLine     GenericComparer.SortDescending = direction == ListSortDirection.Descending ? true : false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     List<T> list = (List<T>)Items;Di2015NewLine     list.Sort(delegate(T lhs, T rhs)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (sortProperty != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           object lhsValue = lhs == null ? null :Di2015NewLine           sortProperty.GetValue(lhs);Di2015NewLine           object rhsValue = rhs == null ? null :Di2015NewLine           sortProperty.GetValue(rhs);Di2015NewLine           int result;Di2015NewLine           if (lhsValue == null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              result = -1;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           else if (rhsValue == null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              result = 1;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           elseDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              result = GenericComparer.Compare(lhs, rhs);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     });Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void RemoveSortCore()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     sortDirection = ListSortDirection.Ascending;Di2015NewLine     sortProperty = null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6228513Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyGenericComparer : IByColumnComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private string columnToCompare;Di2015NewLine  private bool descending;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public string SortColumnDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     get { return columnToCompare; }Di2015NewLine     set { columnToCompare = value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool SortDescendingDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     get { return descending; }Di2015NewLine     set { descending = value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public MyGenericComparer(string column, bool descend)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     columnToCompare = column;Di2015NewLine     descending = descend;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     MyGenericObject firstObj = (MyGenericObject )x;Di2015NewLine     MyGenericObject secondObj = (MyGenericObject )y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (descending) Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        MyGenericObject tmp = secondObj ;Di2015NewLine        secondObj = firstObj ;Di2015NewLine        firstObj = tmp;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (columnToCompare == "StringColumn")Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        //Run code to compare strings, return the appropriate intDi2015NewLine        //eg, "1" if firstObj was greater, "-1" is secondObj, "0" if equalDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (columnToCompare == "IntColumn")Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        //Run code to compare ints, return the appropriate intDi2015NewLine        //eg, "1" if firstObj was greater, "-1" is secondObj, "0" if equalDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6228670Di2015UniqueSeparatorevent EventHandler OnConnect = delegate{};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ListenerThreadProc()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var eventName = "OnConnect";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create an event to wait onDi2015NewLine    IntPtr @event = NativeMethods.CreateEvent (IntPtr.Zero, true, false, eventName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // register for the notificationDi2015NewLine    NativeMethods.CeRunAppAtEvent (Di2015NewLine           string.Format("\\\\\\\\.\\\\Notifications\\\\NamedEvents\\\\{0}", eventName),Di2015NewLine           (int) NOTIFICATION_EVENT.NOTIFICATION_EVENT_RS232_DETECTED);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(!m_shutdown)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // wait for the event to be setDi2015NewLine        // use a 1s timeout so we don't prevent thread shutdownDi2015NewLine        if(NativeMethods.WaitForSingleObject(@event, 1000) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // raise an eventDi2015NewLine            OnConnect(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // unregister the notificationDi2015NewLine    NativeMethods.CeRunAppAtEvent (Di2015NewLine           string.Format("\\\\\\\\.\\\\Notifications\\\\NamedEvents\\\\{0}", eventName),Di2015NewLine           (int) NOTIFICATION_EVENT.NOTIFICATION_EVENT_NONE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // clean up the event handleDi2015NewLine    NativeMethods.CloseHandle(@event);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6238365Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Bar(Foo input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Foo to Bar");Di2015NewLine        return new Bar();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Baz(Foo input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Foo to Baz");Di2015NewLine        return new Baz();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct BarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Baz(Bar input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Bar to Baz");Di2015NewLine        return new Baz();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct BazDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Foo? x = new Foo();Di2015NewLine        Bar? y = new Bar();Di2015NewLine        Baz? z = new Baz();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Unbracketed:");Di2015NewLine        Baz? a = x ?? y ?? z;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Grouped to the left:");Di2015NewLine        Baz? b = (x ?? y) ?? z;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Grouped to the right:");Di2015NewLine        Baz? c = x ?? (y ?? z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6239519Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool IsResourceModified(string url, DateTime dateTime) {            Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(new Uri(url));Di2015NewLine        request.IfModifiedSince = dateTime;Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "HEAD";Di2015NewLine        var response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(WebException ex) {Di2015NewLine        if(ex.Status != WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError)Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var response = (HttpWebResponse)ex.Response;Di2015NewLine        if(response.StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.NotModified)Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6239644Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ListDirectory(TreeView treeView, string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    treeView.Nodes.Clear();Di2015NewLine    var rootDirectoryInfo = new DirectoryInfo(path);Di2015NewLine    treeView.Nodes.Add(CreateDirectoryNode(rootDirectoryInfo));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static TreeNode CreateDirectoryNode(DirectoryInfo directoryInfo)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var directoryNode = new TreeNode(directoryInfo.Name);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var directory in directoryInfo.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine        directoryNode.Nodes.Add(CreateDirectoryNode(directory));Di2015NewLine    foreach (var file in directoryInfo.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine        directoryNode.Nodes.Add(new TreeNode(file.Name));Di2015NewLine    return directoryNode;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6239644Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ListDirectory(TreeView treeView, string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    treeView.Nodes.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<TreeNode>();Di2015NewLine    var rootDirectory = new DirectoryInfo(path);Di2015NewLine    var node = new TreeNode(rootDirectory.Name) { Tag = rootDirectory };Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currentNode = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        var directoryInfo = (DirectoryInfo)currentNode.Tag;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var directory in directoryInfo.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var childDirectoryNode = new TreeNode(directory.Name) { Tag = directory };Di2015NewLine            currentNode.Nodes.Add(childDirectoryNode);Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(childDirectoryNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var file in directoryInfo.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine            currentNode.Nodes.Add(new TreeNode(file.Name));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    treeView.Nodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6241238Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum PermissionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Default = 0,Di2015NewLine    Disallow = 0,Di2015NewLine    Allow = 1,Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PermissionMap : DataTableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, int> actionMap = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PermissionMap(IEnumerable<string> actions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Columns.Add(new DataColumn("Action"));Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var action in actions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            actionMap.Add(action, i++);Di2015NewLine            var row = NewRow();Di2015NewLine            row["Action"] = action;Di2015NewLine            Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddUser(string user)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Columns.Add(new DataColumn(user));Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in Rows)Di2015NewLine            row[user] = Permission.Default;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Permission this[string user, string action]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Permission)Rows[actionMap[action]][user]; }Di2015NewLine        set { Rows[actionMap[action]][user] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6241238Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var permissionMap = new PermissionMap(new[] { "Read", "Write" });Di2015NewLine        permissionMap.AddUser("Bill");Di2015NewLine        permissionMap.AddUser("Jane");Di2015NewLine        permissionMap["Bill", "Read"] = Permission.Allow;Di2015NewLine        permissionMap["Jane", "Write"] = Permission.Allow;Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn column in permissionMap.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(column.ColumnName);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(",");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in permissionMap.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn column in permissionMap.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(row[column]);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(",");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
